Therefore वर्षा is significant for धान . 
In भारत अनुकूल भूमि for खेती of धान is in पश्चिम बंगाल , होता है has सर्वाधिक उत्पादन . 
Paddy in देश is mostly सबसे अधिक खेती in डेल्टा and गंगा मध्य गंगा मैदान , , डेल्टा and valleys of tributaries , valleys of ब्रह्मपुत्र and सतलज from where भारत receives around 75 % or धान . 
There is अपार for वृद्धि of चावल उत्पादन in भारत and प्रयास भी are being made in इस दिशा and किसानों are being उपलब्ध with खाद and कीटनाशक . 
The per hectare हैक्टेयर उत्पादन in आंध्र प्रदेश and Tamil Nadu is generally double of बिहार and आंध्र प्रदेश . 
मुख्य कारण is पर्याप्त सुविधा through canals for खेती in डेल्टा क्षेत्र of पूर्वी तट . 
Sugarcane is व्यापारिक फसल of गन्ना संसार . 
इसकी is आधार of यह चीनी उद्योग and इसकी is primarily खेती in भारत . 
गन्ना भी is also among फसल of भारत . 
सबसे ज्यादा क्षेत्र under खेती in भारत ही is highest in संसार . 
यह is संसार दूसरा सबसे बड़ा गन्ना producing उत्पादक देश of संसार . 
भारत produces around one-fourth of संसार गन्ना . 
Here गन्ने is being खेती in मैदान of गंगा since ancient times and according to some scholars भारत ही is मूल स्थान of गन्ने from where इसकी has फैली to अन्य भागों of संसार . 
सिंचाई is जरूरत due to वर्षा but sugarcane becomes less sweet due to वर्षा . 
ठण्डा and chilly weather is also harmful for गन्ने . 
शुष्क and मृदु तापमान is beneficial during कटाई . 
For खेती , wet jwalamukhi and इन सारी मिट्टियों should have sufficient strength to maintain आर्द्रता of इन सारी मिट्टियों . 
मिट्टी , , मिट्टी , and मिट्टी , are the most appropriate for this . 
Sugarcane pulls a large section of उर्वरता in itself . 
Therefore there is जरूरत to डालने in खाद and खाद in ज्यादातर भारी मात्रा . 
93 % of भूमि under sugarcane farming in भारत is सिंचित है . 
उद्योग of भारत was नष्ट due to इस प्रतियोगिता and भारत बन गया प्रमुख आयातक of चीनी . 
There has always been उत्तरोत्तर वृद्धि , in the per hectare उपज भी due to उत्तरोत्तर वृद्धि , in scientific methods , खाद , सुविधा . 
Except पहाड़ी भागों of कश्मीर and हिमाचल गन्ना is grown in almost all पहाड़ी भागों of देश but होता है is mostly grown in upper and मध्य गंगा plain and irrigated सिंचित क्षेत्रों of हरियाणा . 
The warm climate of दक्षिण भारत is the most favorable for गर्म जलवायु गन्ने . 
Therefore गन्ना grown here are thicker and the per hectare पैदावार compared to उत्तर भारत is more . 
मिट्टी here is less fertile than मिट्टी of गंगा and इसमें needs more manure . 
Sugarcane is फसल of longer duration . 
It stays in खेतों for around 12 months . 
अदसाली गन्ना is of उत्तम नस्ल , पैदावार is more . 
The per hectare हेक्टर उत्पादन of गन्ने in भारत is very less as compared to foreign . 
The major factors are कमी of आदर्श जलवायु for the growth of गन्ने in भारत , गन्ने , अवैज्ञानिक कृषि , , छोटे खेत and कमी of खाद . 
गन्ने is primarily मुख्य उपयोग for खांडसारी and चीनी उत्पादन . 
भारत is the major exporter of चाय . 
भारत ही only is उत्पादक of चाय in संसार and देश is सबसे बड़ा उपभोक्ता भी of चाय . 
चीन ही is only supposed to be the place of origin of चाय though in आसाम भी also जंगली पौधे of चाय were seen growing during 1823 . 
The responsibility of growing इसकी is mostly in हाथ of ज्यादातर बड़ी बड़ी कम्पनियों which तैयार चाय for बाजार in their factories apart from running बागानों . 
ऊँचा तापमान and अधिक वर्षा is जरूरत for खेती . 
Long dry and extreme लम्बी शुष्क ऋतु both are harmful for चाय . 
पौधा can not bear बहुत तेज धूप . 
Therefore वृक्ष भी are also grown along with पौधे साथ . 
इसकी requires cheap and skilled labors and बड़ी संख्या because पत्तियाँ are picked by हाथ . 
चाय is cultivated in बड़े बड़े बगानों whose आकार ranges from 10 hectares to 400 hectares . 
80 % of भूमि under चाय in भारत is in आसाम and पश्चिम बंगाल and शेष are in तमिलनाडु and केरल . 
Majority of the tea gardens are स्थित in ज्यादातर बागान आसाम and पश्चिम बंगाल . 
मिट्टी here is deep and extremely fertile . 
The job of पत्तियाँ picking in इस क्षेत्र is done by skilled women who have basically gone to काम in चाय बगानों of आसाम from इस क्षेत्र . 
West Bengal ranks second in terms of पश्चिम बंगाल चाय उत्पादन . 
But खेती is not so extensive here and it आधी of भूमि of आसाम . 
All the tea gardens in the districts of Darjeeling , Jalpaigudi and Kooch Vihar are सीमित . 
Majority of बागान are found in दुआर from where around 75 % of पश्चिम बंगाल takes place . 
Here बगान are small and संख्या is more . 
अन्य खरीदार in India are from ब्रिटेन , , जर्मनी and अन्य देश of यूरोप and अन्य देश of पश्चिमी एशिया . 
In इन सभी देशों भारतीय चाय faces tough competition from कीनिया and श्रीलंका ? 
In order to पुर्नस्थापित in पुराने बाजारों भारत has to increase both the quantity and गुणवत्ता of चाय and reduce the cost of उत्पादन खर्च in उत्पादकता . 
The most important क्षेत्र of उत्पन्न सबसे उत्तम कपास has gone to पाकिस्तान side as पाकिस्तान has come into अस्तित्व yet भूमि under cotton cultivation in भारत is more . 
21 प्रतिशत of भूमि under कपास and 21 प्रतिशत of 16 प्रतिशत भाग of संसार is in भारत . 
Cotton is supposed to पौधा of उपोष्ण जलवायु . 
Extreme cold weather is harmful for इसके . 
कपास does n't जरूरत अधिक वर्षा . 
In भारत कपास is primarily grown in क्षेत्रों of 50 to 100 वर्षा . 
At least 50 कम से कम 50 सेन्टीमीटर वर्षा is utmost important but for अच्छे उत्पादन उपयुक्त सामयिक वितरण is much more important than मात्रा of कम से कम 50 सेन्टीमीटर वर्षा . 
जमा in मिट्टी is harmful for पौधे therefore मिट्टी is required which has low water current . 
If there is पर्याप्त वर्षा in क्षेत्र , of काली मिट्टी before कपास then पर्याप्त वर्षा is hardly जरूरत at the time of cotton growth . 
खेती of cotton especially sowing takes place in महीने of April-May . 
Many labors are जरूरत at the time of picking कपास . 
गुणवत्ता of कपास depends on लम्बाई ही of रेशे . 
The more is लम्बाई of रेशे , the best is कपास and the more fine उतनी ही अधिक महीन सूत and fabric can होती है , तैयार from होती है , . 
Therefore उत्पादन of कपास with long and medium लम्बे रेशे is growing . 
खेती of विदेशी कपास is not नहीं मिली है बहुत सफलता in क्षेत्रों of काली मिट्टी . 
Therefore देशी किस्मों ही could grow there . 
In पंजाब and हरियाणा it is above 400 kg but it is only 120 kg in महाराष्ट्र . 
It is also required to decrease उत्पादन मूल्य of भारतीय कपास . 
The average production of कपास in भारत is 300 kg . 
इस देशों have विकसित new scientific methods and new varieties of बीजों and are ला रहे हैं them . 
The farmers have not been much successful in किसान उपयोग जो नये बीज विकसित so far in भारत in an extensive and economical way . 
मूल्य of भारतीय कपास is more than भारतीय कपास . 
प्रयत्न are being made to bring in प्रयोग of बीजों in order to increase the per hectare उपज of कपास in भारत . 
After विभाजन of भारत because of कपास क्षेत्र of पंजाब and सिंध being taken into पाकिस्तान उत्पादन of कपास in भारत बृहत to a large extent . 
मात्रा of आयात has कम due to वृद्धि in उत्पादन of देश and because of वृद्धि in खेती of कपास with लम्बे रेशे . 
But along with this there has been persistent fluctuation in वार्षिक उत्पादन . 
There is fluctuation in वार्षिक उत्पादन according to मौसम . 
भारत exports a bit of best quality कपास of long and short fibrous , but देश still lacks कपास of medium and long रेशे . 
Because of the unhealthy relations between पाकिस्तान and भारत , भारत had to face a lot of बहुत दिक्कत in मिलने जूट from पाकिस्तान . 
Hence भारत प्रयास to speedily बहुत वृद्धि पैदावार and within 15 20 वर्षों भीतर there was बहुत वृद्धि in पैदावार of जूट in भारत . 
Recently because of कमी of मांग for जूट there has not been वृद्धि in क्षेत्र and उत्पादन . 
इसकी is sown between मार्च and मई . 
खेती is basically done in डेल्टा of river Ganges and घाटी of river Brahmaputra . 
Here the fertile उपजाऊ मिट्टी brought by rivers is found which remains new and fresh because of the floods . 
पटसन is sown in पश्चिम बंगाल during April-May and यह becomes ready by August-September . 
But समय for sowing in आसाम and बिहार is during March-April , and during May-June in Orissa . 
After getting prepared पौधे are काटकर , rotten in पानी and रेशों are separated . 
Because of its specialty यह क्षेत्र with plenty of surface water sources provides व्यापक आधार to इस फसल and उद्योग . 
उत्पादक of जूट is पश्चिम बंगाल where around 2 of भारतीय जूट क्षेत्र is found and from where 70 % 70 % उत्पादन is procured . 
Apart from warm & आर्द्र जलवायु and उपजाऊ डेल्टाई मिट्टी , सस्ते मजदूर is also available . 
In बिहार इसकी is basically खेती in मैदान of Mahananda and Kosi in महानन्दा and Saharsa . 
बिहार grows around 13 % of भारत लगभग 13 प्रतिशत जूट . 
The per hectare प्रति हेक्टर उत्पादन in बिहार is less than बंगाल . 
आसाम grows around 10 % of भारत लगभग 10 प्रतिशत जूट . 
भारत basically exports goods made of जूट . 
India ranks first in उत्पादन of जूट in संसार while इसका ranks second among जूट उद्योग of संसार . 
The major cereals are गेहूँ and मिलेट and पश्चात मकई and दलहनों come after that . 
Rice states are फैला है in उन भागों of the country where वार्षिक वर्षा is more than 100cm . 
Along with चावल साथ in पश्चिम बंगाल and Valley of आसाम , चाय on hilly slopes and jute on fertile नीयती भूमि are important . 
apart from चावल स्थान of मिलेट comes in पठारी and पहाड़ी भागों of छोटानागपुर , , Orissa and निकटवर्ती आंध्र प्रदेश . 
Apart from चावल in तटीय मैदान of तमिलनाडु , मुख्य फसल in उत्तरी भाग are maize and groundnut and millet and cotton in उत्तरी भाग . 
प्रदेश are स्थित in उत्तर पश्चिम of भारत . 
वार्षिक वर्षा here is less than 60 60 सेमी . and मिट्टी is fertile . 
फसलें are more important in इस प्रदेश . 
कपास and गन्ना are significant among माली फसलों . 
Fruits सेब are significant in हिमालय क्षेत्र . 
मिट्टी in the plains rocky regions are either red or black मिट्टी . 
Apart from मिलेट साथ , गेहूँ and तेलहन are significant in पश्चिमी राजस्थान . 
मूँगफली and कपास in काठियावाड़ क्षेत्र of गुजरात very significant among the cash माली फसलों . 
Especially in Kathiyavad मूँगफली ही is फसल . 
In मिलेट , , कपास and मूँगफली are तीन महत्त्वपूर्ण फसलें , and apart from them गेहूँ भी is also significant in उत्तरी भागों . 
Tobacco is significant in गंटुर क्षेत्र of आंध्र प्रदेश . 
मुख्य फसलें are maize and millet . 
The forests are burnt here to साफ the land for जमीन खेती . 
The per hectare हेक्टर उत्पादन of हर फसल in भारत is less than विश्व औसत . 
The per hectare production of चावल in भारत is 2 of उत्पादन ऑस्ट्रेलिया and less than half of जापान and इटली . 
रिजर्व बैंक has expressed वार्षिक रपट over विकास दर in the annual agricultural report . 
विकास दर of agricultural development थी , 4.4 फीसदी during 80s which रह गयी to 3.2 during 90s and at present has fallen to 4.4 फीसदी . 
अर्थ of विकास दर is that कृषि उत्पादन is increasing but विकास दर is persistently कम . 
रिजर्व बैंक has blamed निवेश in कृषि क्षेत्र by सरकार for इस स्थिति . 
यह 2.6 फीसदी of देश आय during 70s was being खर्च on बुनियादी सुविधाओं , such as नहर and बीज अनुसंधान but currently हो रहा था , is restricted to यह 2.6 फीसदी . 
रिजर्व बैंक has आगाह सरकार to increase सरकारी निवेश in कृषि to maintain विकास दर in कृषि . 
The anxiety is रिजर्व बैंक is right . 
कृषि उत्पादन will वृद्धि with वृद्धि in निवेश . 
The income of किसान is तय by गुणांक of आय उत्पादन and मूल्य . 
कारण behind बिगड़ती हालत of किसानों is reduction in मूल्यों of कृषि उत्पादों . 
Though हो गया है seems that मूल्य of कृषि उत्पादों are बढ़ रहे हैं , , for example 20 years back मूल्य of गेहूं था 5rs and currently हो गया है is 12rs and during इसी अवधि मूल्य of a car has increased from 55000 Rupees to 220000 Rupees . 
Which means that there has been चार गुना वृद्धि in माल of इंडस्ट्री while माल has चार गुना वृद्धि गुना . 
कारण of इस गिरावट in मूल्यों of agricultural products is न्यून वृद्धि in वैश्‍विक जनसंख्या because of which there is न्यून वृद्धि in the expenditure of खाद्यान्न . 
A person can खा सकता है , 5-10 chapatis एक दिन but वह can travel in many cars . 
Thus मांग of कृषि उत्पादों is limited . 
कृषि उत्पादन is consistently बढ़ता जा रहा है . 
Forests are being काट कर to build खेत . 
There has been वृद्धि in उत्पादन of अन्न due to नयी संकर किस्म of बीजों . 
बांध has विकास by building canals . 
मांग of खाद्यान्न is limited while the supply is बढ़ रही है . 
with this दाम of कृषि उत्पादों are गिर रहे हैं in विश्‍व बाजार . 
In such a situation सरकार should have sheltered घरेलू बाजार of कृषि उत्पादों and should have artificially increased the prices so that the farmers could fill पेट . 
The farmers could have been प्रेरित to increase किसान उत्पादन प्रेरित by the high prices with which खाद्य सुरक्षा भी of देश could also होकर ensured . 
अमीर देशों have done the same thing to maintain खाद्य सुरक्षा . 
They are providing सब्सिडी to किसानों in large numbers with which किसानों are उत्पादन in large numbers . 
Because of जनसंख्या इस विशाल उत्पादन is being खपत in देश . 
लागत of अमीर देशों is more yet they are निर्यात . 
उत्पादन लागत of production in भारत is low yet we are importing it . 
In this perspective , रिजर्व बैंक says that सरकारी निवेश on बुनियादी सुविधाओं should be increased to maintain विकास दर of कृषि . 
यह नीति is absolutely fine , provided उत्पादन is निर्यात . 
Then खाद्य सुरक्षा will be maintained with उत्पादन . 
Also the domestic prices will remain high and आय of किसान will increase by सरप्लस उत्पादन . 
For this इसके is necessary for सरकार to दे सब्सिडी on निर्यात of कृषि उत्पादों . 
परिणाम of निवेश is opposite due to अभाव of निर्यात सब्सिडी . 
उत्पादन is वृद्धि due to निवेश in कृषि . 
Thus मूल्य of कृषि उत्पादों fall . 
Consequently किसान आय falls and despite अधिक उत्पादन किसान are मजबूर to commit आत्महत्या . 
The has been so many investments in बुनियादी सुविधाओं during पिछले 60 वर्षों . 
Despite these investments we have to आयात गेहूं , , दाल and खाद्य तेल . 
कारण the falling prices . 
सरकार should increase निवेश as per सुझाव of रिजर्व बैंक but at the same time it should also व्यवस्था for निर्यात of अधिक उत्पादन . 
Unfortunately , सरकार is moving in विपरीत दिशा . 
निवेश in कृषि is being कम and आयात is being increased . 
वार्ता between यूरोपीय यूनियन भारत and ब्राजील बीच has failed . 
It था an agricultural issue . 
अमेरिका थी demanded that भारत should remove the security being दिये जाने to कृषि उत्पादों . 
By reducing the imports of कृषि उत्पादों by भारत अमेरिका किसान will मिलेगा बाजार of apples , बादाम , , wine etc. . 
Therefore America is demanding that भारत should open कृषि बाजार for आयात . 
In contrast , भारत demands that U. S. should कम सब्सिडी given to किसानों . 
American farmers are making अमेरिकी किसान उत्पादन expensive . 
Yet they sell माल in भारत because they are मिल रही है सब्सिडी in large numbers . 
Because of the lack of consent on this issue वार्ता has been canceled . 
Some Indian scholars believe that instead of sticking on कृषि भारत should adopt a flexible way . 
They कहना that कृषि is unsuccessful . 
लागत of उत्पादन is usually more . 
That is why we have to protect किसानों with cheap imports . 
This is true that American farmers are बेच रहा है , सस्ता माल because of अमेरिकी किसान सब्सिडी but दूसरे देश are getting सस्ता माल from us without अमेरिकी किसान सब्सिडी . 
For example तेल of मलेशिया is cheap and सरसों and तेल is getting expensive . 
Thus we should केंद्रित on service sectors . 
We are at number one position in terms of service sectors . 
In such a situation making कृषि a major issue is like saving डूबती नाव . 
On दूसरी तरफ we are powerful in service sectors . 
In संस्कृति , जोर is जोर on विकास of वृद्धि . 
That is why इंजीनियर are successful . 
Thus we should suffer some loss in कृषि but केंद्रित on अवसरों of service sectors . 
समस्या is that योगदान of कृषि in देश आय has been तेजी steadily . 
90 % of 90 फीसदी आय आती थी from कृषि during स्वतंत्रता . 
आज only 19 मात्र 19 फीसदी is आ रही है from कृषि . 
But 60 % people are dependent on this 19 % . 
नाव of कृषि is obviously नाव but यात्री have boarded it . 
Before letting the ship sink it is necessary to make the arrangements for यात्रियों to sit in the flight . 
Therefore कृषि can not होने abandoned before creating 3 करोड़ रोजगार in service sectors . 
यह भी is also uncertain that रोजगार would हो जायेंगे created in service sectors in इतनी बड़ी संख्या . 
The scope for रोजगार in services like software , पर्यटन आदि seem to be सीमित . 
सरकार should soon गणित on this matter . 
We should देखना चाहिए that out of 30 करोड़ कृषि श्रमिकों , in which किन सेवा क्षेत्रों 20 करोड़ be engaged and how much कितना समय will this transition take . 
कदम should be taken soon to हासिल this transition . 
Previously कैपिटल सब्सिडी योजना थी in function . 
सरकार used to देती थी अनुदान to स्थापित नये उद्योगों . 
Thus विस्तार of अनुदान सेवा क्षेत्र will take समय . 
Till then we should स्थगित डब्ल्यूटीओ वार्ता .

भारत is capable in क्षमता सेवा क्षेत्र , चीन in मैन्यूफैक्चरिंग and सउदी अरब in तेल .

While उच्चारण हिंदी शब्द farmer ' in अंग्रेजी or फार्मर in Hindi an image of a man emerges in सोच of लोगों . 
The loss of इस सोच is suffered by महिलाओं associated with कृषि and associated sectors -LRB- animal husbandry , कृषि , forestry and nursery . 
कुल भागीदारी of महिलाओं in farming sector work is 40 प्रतिशत . 
Among the total male workers working in कृषि क्षेत्र आज , there are कुल पुरुष and 75 % 75 प्रतिशत महिलाएं . 
85 % of 85 प्रतिशत महिलाएं among rural women workers do विभिन्न काम associated with कृषि . 
In the agriculture महिलाएं are engaged in work right from बीज to playing भूमिका of मैनेजर . 
महिलाएं are धुरी of कृषि . 
But इस महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका was never स्वीकार . 
Possibly that s why हक of महिलाओं in agricultural is कृषि सम्पत्ति is almost none and despite high dynamics they मिलती है very less बहुत कम मजदूरी as compared to पुरुषों . 
Looking at such kind of ऐसे लैंगिक भेदभाव and the international nature of कृषि राष्‍ट्रीय महिला आयोग for महिलाओं has तैयार ड्राफ्ट नामक National Policy for महिलाओं in कृषि ' with the objective to attract ध्यान of agriculture policy makers towards the needs and problems of महिलाओं related to कृषि . 
In इस नीतिगत दस्तावेज तैयार by स्वामीनाथन आयोग , significant concerns associated with किसानों and कृषि क्षेत्र has been ignored . 
Consequently राष्‍ट्रीय महिला आयोग for women यह पहल this looking at the various avenues of कृषि in the contemporaneity scenario . 
विशेष जोर was विशेष जोर on shared land lease in कृषि संपत्ति in इस राष्‍ट्रीय नीति .

सरकार has been recommended to काम steadily on shared lease in राष्‍ट्रीय किसान नीति . 
Food , special education of महिलाओं and arts have not been स्वीकार in राष्‍ट्रीय किसान नीति . 
ऐसा reflects in राष्‍ट्रीय किसान नीति तैयार by the former well known एमएस स्वामीनाथन अध्यक्ष of राष्‍ट्रीय किसान आयोग , it has been कहा गया है in ड्राफ्ट of national women 's राष्‍ट्रीय किसान आयोग . 
While according to ड्राफ्ट तैयार by राष्‍ट्रीय महिला आयोग for महिलाओं पारंपरिक ज्ञान of महिलाओं regarding बीज and जैव विविधता can साबित to हो सकता है profitable . 
इस ज्ञान should होना चाहिए स्वीकार and होना चाहिए should होना चाहिए इस्तेमाल भी in कृषि अनुसंधान . 
Transforming परिदृश्य in देश is not that simple .

काम provides सेवाएं to पूरे कृषि समुदाय but they pay more attention towards the male workers and in such a situation महिलाएं are ignored . 
कृषिगत व्यवस्था does not नहीं लेता interest in the problems of महिलाओं .

Possibly पहली बार in इतिहास of देश 18 दिवसीय एक कृषि आन्दोलन नामक ' बीज सत्याग्रह यात्रा ' ' was run पिछले दिनों which aimed at awaring किसानों and saving their traditional agricultural benefits . 
In 1917 in Champaran -LRB- bihar -RRB- , during the English rule in India Nation 's father महात्मा गांधी ran आन्दोलन against the exploitation of किसानों . 
From इसी ऐतिहासिक भूमि शिवा who did an agitation for महिलाओं and पर्यावरण had started a 18 day said 18 दिवसीय उक्‍त बीज सत्याग्रह यात्रा in the convenorship of her organization ' संयोजकत्व ' in which किसानों of झारखंड and राजस्थान had participated . 
In the president 's इस यात्रा at mausoleum Rajghat the participants ली the oath of ' ' बीज संप्रभुता and खाद्य सुरक्षा ' ' . 
The suspicion of ' ' बीज सत्याग्रह यात्रा ' is wide ranged . 
As आज has सिमट to वैश्‍विक गांव , लाभ and हानि have हो जाने like संक्रामक बीमारी . 
कृषि भी is also प्रभावित by इससे . 
तमाम अन्तर्राष्‍ट्रीय संगठन चल रहे under प्रभुत्व of विकसित देशों are not only exploiting the developing and विकसित देशों by any means but also wish to keep them in the same condition . 
परम्परागत बीजों instead of परम्परागत बीजों is आधारभूत हिस्सा of इस साजिश . 
If किसी देश of community captures कृषि बीजों of दुनिया then हो जाय can not हो जाय said to हो जाय a world victory . 
It is necessary to remind in the context that an ex politician of पूर्व राजनयिक हेनरी किसिंजर had कहा था that if we नियंत्रण the food grain of दुनिया then we can also नियंत्रण जनसंख्या भी . 
There are सिर्फ दो आधारभूत कारण behind the farmer suicides in देश - the first is that we almost completely छोड़ दिया परम्परागत बीजों and कृषि and दूसरा is despite knowing सरकार has not संरक्षित कृषि . 
यह भी is also not less surprising that only 57 million क्षेत्रफल out of the total 190 million क्षेत्रफल of देश is सिंचित . 
Traditionally , there is इतनी विविधता of कृषि in देश that किसान can not रह ही नहीं सकता hungry . 
46 out of the total of कुल 60 प्रकार of world 's मृदा -LRB- clay -RRB- are found here , where कुल 60 प्रकार of फसल can grow . 
We also have ऋतुएं भी here . 
In contrast abroad usually there a similar kind of एक सा मौसम and a typical kind of soil . 
Therefore कृषि can not निर्भर on बीजों of that place . 
पारम्परिक बीजों include hundreds of varieties of पारम्परिक बीजों like Paspalum scrobiculatum , maize , millet , paddy , lentil , pigeon pea , sorghum for which प्राकृतिक वर्षा ही is sufficient . 
There is कामचलाऊ पैदावार despite वर्षा . 
देशी बीज are according to मौसम here and they do not get infected by कीटों and diseases while उपचार and keeping of देशी बीज costs a lot . 
उनके ही is साजिश of बहुराष्‍ट्रीय कम्पनियों to refrain भारतीय किसानों from उत्पादन , of बीजों , बचत and commutation .

पाश्‍चात्य देशों and we have हर प्रकार of social and geographical differences . 
Therefore we are incomparable .

In भारतीय लोक परंपरा there is बौद्धिक ज्ञान related to vegetation , herbs cow-dung , cow-urine , minerals , juice-science . 
Thousands of ideas benefiting मानव शरीर from वनस्पति and animals are easily available in canons like Ayurveda , Yajurveda , Bhavprakash etc. . 
Because of लापरवाही of भारत सरकार anybody is free to get पेटेंट from these ideas . 
Because of इसी लापरवाही पेटेंट on नीम , , बासमती चावल and हल्दी went to foreign and we could not do anything . 
After getting पेटेंट of नीम some multinational companies of अमेरिका and जापान have enslaved बौद्धिक अधिकार by expressing बौद्धिक अधिकार on विभिन्न कीटनाशक , , जैवरासायनिक and medicinal values . 
Neem has been a priceless asset of नीम भारत that is why our sages शुरू परंपरा of planting इसे in house yard . 
Some companies have made हल्दी भी also their prey . 
Thus बासमती चावल देन of पंजाब has the medicinal value of keeping food channels healthy but we do not have right even on this . 
A similar buggering is being carried with परंपरागत भारतीय बीजों साथ भी and सरकार is quiet and may be मौन . 
बीज are not only destroying फसलों तो but also tremendously ejecting harmful effects . 
The bacteria डाले गये in इस तरह of बीजों grow half-breed bacteria or वायरस which are giving जन्म to इस तरह of unknown diseases . 
Recently सूचना was sought by the green peas organization regarding the effects of बीज on बैंगन , , lady 's सरसों and फसलों . 
After परीक्षण हुआ was known that बीज are poisonous which are adversely affecting स्वास्थ्य and also पहुंचा रहे हैं कृषि भूमि भी . 
केंद्र सरकार is विचार in संशोधन पेटेंट कानून . 
Under इस कानून the drug companies get the right to sell new drugs for 20 वर्षों at their desired prices , केंद्र सरकार is विचार that पेटेंट be दिए जायें only on केवल मौलिक शोध . 
पेटेंट should not हो चुका है न दिया जाये , on मामूली शोध or on नए फार्मूलेशन of old drugs , such as पेटेंट on पैरासेटामाल , पुरानी दवाओं that reduces बुखार has been ended . 
If चीनी is डाल दी जाये in पैरासेटामाल to make मिल जायेगा sweet then मिल जायेगा can again be patented , giving पुन : पेटेंट on पैरासेटामाल will fetch sole right to आवेदक कंपनी to make इस दवा for अगले 20 वर्षों . 
सामान्य बुद्धि says that putting चीनी with पैरासेटामाल can not be नहीं कहा जा सकता है ' आविष्कार . 
सरकार wants to curb इस प्रकार of मामूली आविष्कारों but in the W.T.O trips negotiations it has been कहा गया है that इस प्रकार of मामूली आविष्कारों will be दिया जायेगा पेटेंट . 
Therefore सरकार is झिझक रही है for संशोधन . 
सरकार had elected कमेटी in अध्यक्षता of R. A. Maleshkar to विचार on this issue . 
कमेटी was asked to speak whether giving पेटेंट to केवल मौलिक आविष्कारों would होगा in महत्त्वपूर्ण to ट्रिप्स or not . 
इस प्रकार of a system ha been एक वाद by एक ड्रग कंपनी in चेन्नई हाई कोर्ट . 
सरकार has not नहीं दिया पेटेंट on anti cancer drugs . 
सरकार says that सभी तत्व पूर्व of उस दवा were available during the past and they have again been प्रस्तुत for पेटेंट with मामूली संशोधन . 
माशेलकर कमेटी took निर्णय that मामूली आविष्कारों भी should also get पेटेंट otherwise होगा will उल्लंघन ट्रिप्स कानून . 
कमेटी तर्क that currently in भारत most of the research works are not original but of ordinary kind . 
If there will be प्रतिबंध on patenting मामूली आविष्कारों then the Indian companies will lag behind . 
माशेलकर कमेटी gave ज्यादा महत्त्व to हासिल research skills by the Indian drug companies and ज्यादा महत्त्व to दुष्प्रभाव of high prices of the medicines on जनता . 
Whether the Indian companies progress for लंबे समय or not , भारतीय जनता will definitely suffer दुष्प्रभाव immediately . 
It is fortunate that सुप्रीम कोर्ट of अमेरिका has खारिज the worries of माशेलकर कमेटी . 
व्यवस्था is that पेटेंट will only be दी है for केवल शुद्ध रिसर्च . 
टेलीफ्लेक्स added आविष्कारों . 
सुप्रीम कोर्ट has कहा that पेटेंट can not be नहीं दिया जा सकता है , at इस आविष्कार because इसमें does not have खोज . 
सम्मिलित उपयोग thus सहज ही can हो सकते हैं normal and they can not हो सकते हैं नहीं कहा जा सकता है आविष्कार . 
The patent law of अमेरिका has been पुनर्लेखन with इस निर्णय . 
Until now there थी व्यवस्था for आवेदक to just show that उसने has discovered किसी नयी तकनीक or thing . 
नएपन of गहराई of पड़ताल नहीं थी necessary . 
Even if नयापन was simple in its normal way yet हो सकता था was made पेटेंट .

Currently more 90 फीसदी patents are there with अमीर देशों पास . 
They can कमा रहे हैं भारी लाभ by बेचकर us इन पेटेंटीकृत माल at high price . 
There are two ways in front of us . 
एक रास्ता is that we can होकर a part of their unrighteous act and प्रोत्साहन our companies that they should also receive पेटेंट by मामूली सुधार and get ऊंचे मूल्य from जनता . 
दूसरा रास्ता is to make प्रयास to change पेटेंट कानून ही . 
If it is essential to देना पेटेंट of मामूली सुधार under ट्रिप्स नियम then ट्रिप्स नियम itself should be खारिज . 
We should not न होकर a part of गलत व्यवहार of अमीर देशों and make प्रयास to destroy गलत व्यवहार . 
विडंबना is that वैज्ञानिक are encouraging the drug companies because our companies would छत्रछाया in their shelter .

In कुछ ही वर्षों वैज्ञानिकों began एक विशाल कार्यक्रम to bring वृद्धि in पैदावार of कपास as a result of which more than twice वृद्धि took place in both per hectare पैदावार and पैदावार in कुछ ही वर्षों only . 
क्षेत्र of खेती is maximum in भारत -LRB- around 80 सबसे अधिक ( करीब 80 लाख हेक्टेयर ) -RRB- and this is देश where चारों कृषि योग्य किस्मों of cotton worth खेती are farmed . 
But in उत्पादन india 's स्थान is fourth after रुस and चीन which are सर्वाधिक उत्पादक देश . 
कारण behind उत्पादन of कपास in भारत is that उचित सुविधा is available only in 1 of the agricultural land and the rest of खेती depends upon rain water .

डा. जोशी told students that कपास is a seed fiber which grows from कि of कि . 
It is सदस्य of परिवार which is also known as परिवार in layman 's भाषा . 
36 varieties are approved under 36 जातियाँ but to produce कपास of गौसीपियम प्रजाति from खेती of only four केवल चार प्रकार of कपास is done because 36 जातियाँ are wild . 
Gossypium Hirsutum is the most important सबसे महत्‍त्वपूर्ण वानस्पतिक जाति of these which is originally found in कंबोडिया and मैक्सिको but now गौसीपियम हिर्सुटम ( घोस्स्य्पिउम् Hइर्सुटुम् ) इनमें is being grown in विशाल भाग of यह अमेरिका . 
It is important for many qualities to होना there in फसल . 
Of these कुछ गुण are as follows : Early maturation of फसल , enough availability of प्रतिरक्षा to defend from diseases and insects and pests , of अधिक मज़बूत more harvest , रेशों being more strong etc. . 
New varieties of कपास are being जारी which contain above mentioned qualities . 
For उत्पादन of कपास in प्रत्येक जाति various varieties of कपास have been developed through माध्यम of प्रजनन ( ब्रेएडिन्ग् ) कार्यक्रम . 
The chromosomes of दो जातियों can be interbred to विकसित पौधे . 
Recently कुछ वर्ष पूर्व back एक नए बीज of कपास has been prepared in अमेरिका through genetic modification which is known as एक नए बीज . 
यह बीज provides फसल with the power to fight from diseases and insects . 
With उपयोग there has been काफी वृद्धि in उत्पादन of अमेरिका and चीन . 
अनुमति to sow इस बीज in भारतवर्ष has been recently granted . 
Warm climate , जलवायु पर्याप्‍त नमी and loamy soil along with अच्छी सुविधाएं are required for best cotton सर्वोत्‍तम पैदावार . 
कपास is sown at different times depending upon the climatic condition of क्षेत्र , प्रकार of मिट्टी and जाति and varieties . 
कपास is generally grown in the mid of प्रायः मई मध्य in उत्‍तरी भारत . 
After sowing when बीज उगने बाद and मूल जड़ enters भूमि then it starts taking its food from भूमि for वृद्धि . 
Right from वृद्धि of पौधे to अवस्था there is अधिक प्रभाव of सूरज , warm climate and उपलब्धि आदि of पानी . 
For उदाहरण if there is अधिक तापमान both during दिन and रात then अवस्था begins lately . 
Within four to six weeks हो जाती हैं starts budding and after लगभग 100 दिन बाद of sowing पौधे starts अतिसंवेदनशील फूल white or light dark yellow गहरे पीले रंग very sensitive अतिसंवेदनशील फूल . 
बीजकोष grow very fast and after पकने इसका becomes 2.5 cm in width and 3.8 cm in length . 
बीजकोष ruptures after 80 दिन and during इस समय of वर्ष -LRB- November -RRB- when यह completely opens we get to देखने this sight . 
टेंट of रेशों are generally plucked in दिसंबर माह of November with प्रायः हाथ in भारत and with the help of मशीन in abroad . 
अध्यापक said that silk worm rearing in भारत started in the year 400 . 
Now भारत leads रेशम उत्पादन देशों of the world . 
यह is a small industry where 50,000 गाँव are engaged in कार्य of sericulture . 
भारत ही is एक ऐसा देश where कई प्रकार of रेशम are procured by पालन कई प्रकार of silk worms . 
Golden colored Munga silk is grown only in our county . 
Like agriculture , पालन भी is also एक मुख्य साधन of earning livelihood where many thousands of कई हजार श्रमिक produce यह बहुमूल्य रेशा while काम . 
Silk is prepared by रेशम कई प्रकार of worms but बांबिक्स मोरी is रेशम among them and रेशम is produced in विशेष वातारण of फार्म . 
The larva of this worm खाते हैं mulberry leaves . 
Silkworm looks like तितली from whose eggs initially caterpillar is built . 
Then कैटरपिलर प्यूपा builds a cyst across itself for सुरक्षा in प्रक्रिया of क्राइसेलिस which is known as कोकून . 
क्राइसेलिस पूरा comes out of the cocoon in the form of मॉथ after मॉथ and then मॉथ lays eggs . 
Thus चक्र of रेशम completes . 
They said that they rear पालन of मोरी जाति ही only . 
मॉथ of these insects देती है approximately 700 eggs after coming out of the cocoon and then मर जाती है . 
While silkworms of अन्य जाति देते हैं 350-400 eggs . 
आकार of every egg is equal to आकार of a pin head which has a soft point . 
Because of this soft point कोकून breaks easily . 
These eggs are very light . 
वजन of around 40,000 eggs is just approximately an ounce . 
According to जलवायु these eggs turn into larva within 7 दिन भीतर . 
एक कैटरपिलर eats 7,000-9 ,000 times mulberry leaves of वजन . 
While growing कैटरपिलर frequently changes त्वचा so that it covers आकार . 
Further यह कैटरपिलर becomes a light pink colored transparent worm after which इसकी starts losing रुचि in eating . 
Every worm has two glands which are स्थित in भाग of the worm below its jaw . 
रेशम compresses both its gland and continuously makes two fibers of रेशम . 
If we देखें तो रेशे through microscope then we will know that रेशे is made of रेशे . 
These thin fibers are called brin . 
These two thin silk brins come out coherently with serene in the spinning head which is known as bave . 
रेशे are triangular which have organized molecular chains in the form of micro and macro fibrils . 
एक रेशम makes एक रेशम with the speed of 46 m . 
यह will होगा more appropriate to कहना that while making a complete fibril यह writes the digit 8 for about 12 lakh number of करीब 12 लाख बार . 
While making रेशा the worm loses वजन and the caterpillar chrysalis turns into कैटरपिलर क्राइसेलिस ( प्यूपा ) inside कोकून भीतर and becomes मॉथ in two weeks . 
Now in this condition silkworm takes out क्षारीय पदार्थ and makes pores by dissolving कुछ भाग of कोकून with its help and रेशम कीट come out of कोकून through this pore . 
But in सेरीकल्चर फार्म we do not let क्राइसेलिस come out . 
रेशम कीट is kept in हल्की भाप and मार देते हैं inside कोकून before it comes out . 
इस क्रिया is known as स्टोविंग . 
In क्रिया रेशम is killed inside कोकून भीतर ही but रेशे or कोकून भीतर ही does n't get harmed because of भाप . 
रंग and आकार of कोकून depends upon the diet and जलवायु of the silkworm . 
The cocoon obtained from रेशम in चीन are mostly white in सफेद रंग because कैटरपिलर there eats white mulberry leaves . 
In जापान and यूरोप the cocoon are कोकून क्रीम and light yellow हल्के पीले रंग because there कैटरपिलर there eats castor oil plants and absorbs पदार्थ नामक tannin inside होते . 
In Japan light कोकून भी are also grown whose caterpillars खाते हैं green leaves . 
Apart from सफेद कोकून , gray and light सफेद कोकून are found in भारत . 
In order to differentiate between the luster and softness of प्रत्येक रेशा यह is essential to know that प्रत्येक रेशा is made of दो महीन तंतुओं and दो महीन तंतुओं are joined with saricin glue . 
Thus we can कह सकते हैं that प्रत्येक रेशा is primarily made of दो रासायनिक पदार्थों : दो रासायनिक पदार्थों is fibrin , in the form of liquid which comes out of जो स्पिनरेट and get dried after आकर in संपर्क with हवा and the other is saricin glue . 
Every thread contains approximately 75 % करीब 75 % फिब्रॉयन and 25 % 25 % सैरिसिन . 
चार प्रकार of रेशम are पैदा in ऐरी and मूंगा . 
केवल भारत ही is देश where रेशम is पैदा . 
पालन are reared at कई स्थानों in भारत such as hilly regions of देहरादून and हिमाचल प्रदेश . 
यूनिवोल्टाइन and Bivoltine silkworm in कश्मीर , good quality Multivoltine silkworm in पश्‍चिम बंगाल and कर्नाटक . 
देश produces approximately 90 शेष 10 % mulberry silk and the rest of the 10 % is ऐरी and मूंगा . 
Since when सिल्क बोर्ड has been स्थापना in India , there has been काफी तरक्की in scientific methods of सिल्क उत्पादन . 
The silk worms from which टसर रेशम is obtained are पैदा in warm and temperate climatic regions of देश . 
The cocoons are mostly oval , tough and रंग . 
कैटरपिलर eats oak tree leaves at जगह of mulberry leaves , रंग of कोकून is because of tannin absorption of leaves . 
One does n't needs to kill the tasar silkworm inside कोकून भीतर and लंबे रेशे are easily available . 
But रेशे are thick and tough as compared to रेशे and मात्रा भी of सैरिसिन found in them is also more than moonga and मल्बरी सिल्क . 
रेशम is obtained from मल्टीवोल्टाइन वर्ग of silkworms . 
This silkworm is particularly found in असम . 
कोकून of इस रेशम is closed and the shell is very thin . 
भार of एक कोकून is approximately 6.3 करीब 6.3 ग्राम where पतली परत weighs just 0.5 करीब 6.3 ग्राम . 
यह is a white or red रेशम which is obtained from silkworms of मल्टीवोल्टाइन वर्ग . 
Such worms are reared in Assam , Bihar , Bengal , Manipur , Orissa and Tripura . 
कोकून of such worms are somewhat long . 
भार of a cocoon is just 3 केवल 3 ग्राम . 
विशेषता of such cocoons is that they change colors . 
Because of खुले मुंह of ऐरी सिल्क they can not होने reeled . 
क्रिया of extracting रेशे from cocoon is called reeling . 
इस क्रिया requires sound knowledge of सूझ - बूझ and a good reeling अच्छी रीलिंग मशीन so that रेशम पर्याप्‍त मात्रा of silk is extracted from the cocoon . 
Since रेशा extracted from एक कोकून is very thin and which is difficult to reel therefore रेशा of एक कोकून are together reeled . 
For उदाहरण in order to make a multifilament yarn of 20-22 danier 7 कोकून are sufficient .

In the Doha round , विकसित देशों asked विकसित देशों that if they कम आयात on industrial produce and services , विकसित देशों would कम आयात on agricultural goods in विकसित देशों .

सूक्ष्म - प्रवर्धन of पौधों through ऊतक संवर्धन has सिद्ध to हुआ है excessive successful and popular माध्यम of जनप्रिय आर्थिक विकास .

According to the received figures more than 796 commercial companies of the world are associated with such activities that संख्या are persistently बढ़ती ही जा रही है . 
Approximately 90 crore saplings are annually वार्षिक उत्पादन . 
आज ऊतक संवर्धन उद्योग is primarily fulfilling the requirements of पुष्प - कृषि and उद्यान - कृषि क्षेत्रों . 
In fact tissue ऊतक संवर्धन उद्योग ही is the backbone of पुष्प - कृषि and ऊतक संवर्धन उद्योग ही . 
There is उपभोग , primarily in developed countries and होता है is mostly dependent on social , economic and cultural factors . 
Tissue culture companies are बढ़ रही है in the world and around 90 लगभग 90 करोड़ पौधों are being उत्पादन in इस क्षेत्र .

सकल बाजार is 40 billion 40 खरब annually . 
There are around 120 registered companies in भारत but only 30 are available with उत्पादों in बाजार . 
वार्षिक उत्पादन is approximately 5 5 करोड़ . 
उत्पादन क्षमता in tissue culture depends on many factors such as multiplication rate , स्थानांतरण चक्र , , दक्षता , of workers , लागत मूल्य incurred etc. .

प्रवर्धन is very beneficial in the places where other methods of स्ट्रॉबेरी do not work such as स्ट्रॉबेरी or उन पौधों where उपज of उन पौधों is more than उन पौधों like केला and cardamom . 
For गुणन of अति विशिष्‍ट जातियों at बड़े स्तर , with लक्ष्य of presenting ऊतक - सवर्धन प्रौद्योगिकी , in 1989 जैव - प्रौद्योगिकी विभाग had स्थापित two tissue culture pilot machines , टाटा ऊर्जा शोध संस्थान , नई - दिल्ली -LRB- T.E.R.I. -RRB- and राष्‍ट्रीय रासायनिक प्रयोगशाला , Pune -LRB- N.C. . 
These two services as national services were स्थापित with मुख्य उद्देश्य of गुणन through ऊतक - संवर्धन of अति विशिष्‍ट वन - वृक्ष . 
Every pilot plant had क्षमता to उत्पादन 10 million saplings . 
The initial figures say that in 95-98 % micro-amplified प्रवर्धन पौध सफलतापूर्वक वृद्धि भी is successful . 
मुख्य लक्ष्य of running field testing at many places was to अध्ययन उपयोगिता of various clones in अनेक कृषि - जलवायु क्षेत्रों . 
With प्राप्‍त परिणामों , , best श्रेष्‍ठतम वृद्धि highly specialized clones were identified at a particular place . 
ऊतक संवर्धित पौधों are seen to have cloning क्लोनीय समानता up to 90 प्रतिशत in almost all matters .

कृषि उत्पादकता should be increased with साधन and advanced techniques . 
Third five year तृतीय पंचवर्षीय योजना and agriculture - Under तृतीय पंचवर्षीय योजना कृषि विकास was made प्रमुख उद्देश्य . 
Fourth five year चौथी योजना and agriculture - कृषि विकास has been दी गई उच्च प्राथमिकता in चौथी योजना . 
Not only this in बल was बल on विकास भी of उन उद्योगों also which उपलब्ध agricultural inputs , कृषि आदान उर्वरक , etc. . 
Fifth पाँचवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना and कृषि - In पाँचवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना विकास of कृषि got पर्याप्‍त महत्व and प्रतिवर्ष लक्ष्य of 4.67 प्रतिशत विकास was set in कृषि क्षेत्र . 
In छठी पंचवर्षीय योजना दौरान निम्न कदम for कृषि विज्ञान were primarily taken . 
Dry land farming - During भूमि कृषि विकास कार्यक्रम was initiated . 
In छठीं योजना विशेष बल was विशेष बल on increasing अन्तर्गत कृषि उत्पादन under इस कार्यक्रम . 
Research in कृषि शिक्षा - There should be मध्य समन्वय between विभागों and agricultural universities . 
The agricultural universities will have to play विशिष्‍ट भूमिका in the form of essential systematic research from the perspective of उत्पादन and कृषि विकास in agriculture . 
Use of उर्वरकों - प्रयोग of उर्वरकों प्रयोग दिया गया अधिक महत्त्व so that there could हो सके वृद्धि in कृषि उत्पादन . 
आठवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना and agriculture - आठवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना was सम्बन्धित था to आठवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना . 
There था प्रावधान of spending 22,467 billion rupees in विकास of कृषि . 
Here 34,425 billion rupees on ग्रामीण विकास , , 6750 billion rupees on कार्यक्रम , 35,525 billion rupees on 35,525 करोड़ रुपये सिंचाई and कार्यक्रम were खर्च . 
Thus 22.2 % share of कुल व्यय था for सम्बन्धित कार्यक्रमों . 
मुख्य लक्ष्य of इस योजना था वृद्धि in निर्यात with आत्म - निर्भरता in खाद्यान्न and विविधिकरण of कृषि उत्पादन . 
नौवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना and agriculture - Under नौवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना the agricultural development program थी आधारित on the '' Food घोषित नीति declared by अन्तर्गत कृषि विकास कार्यक्रम सरकार whose prime objective थी to दुगुना the agricultural development with which भारत could be freed from '' hunger '' in अगले दस वर्षों . 
In नौवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना वार्षिक दर of कृषि विकास was set 4.5 प्रतिशत . 
There were सुझाव also for उत्थान भी of marginal and किसानों . 
Special emphasis was also laid on अधोसंरचना and सिंचाई भी . 
क्षेत्रीय कार्यक्रम were run for विकास of hilly backward and tribal क्षेत्रों . 
Remedies to improve कृषि साख were also told . 
Suggestions concerning निर्यात of विकास and promoting cooperation in विकास of agricultural sectors such as मछली पालन , and डेयरी were also देने . 
दसवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना and कृषि - During दसवीं पंचवर्षीय योजना there था प्रावधान of spending 58,933 billion rupees on कृषि and other related areas . 
For कृषि विकास of agriculture under इस योजना there will be more public investment in सिंचाई , , बीजों , , power and streets . 
But आर्थिक सहायता given on जल and power would be lowered . 
नहर प्रणाली would be kept properly . 
न्यूनतम समर्थन कीमतों of खाद्यान्न and other products would be co-ordinated in इस प्रकार that विविधिकरण , in कृषि and संबंधी सुरक्षा gets प्रोत्साहन and खाद्यान्न खाद्यान्न अनुदान is lowered . 
The 76 % share of कृषि योग्य भूमि is with सीमान्त किसानों पास in देश . 
Further जो छोटे किसान have very less बहुत कम कृषि योग्य भूमि . 
They earn जीविका only with कृषि मात्र . 
कृषि is एक ऐसा कार्य which is entirely dependent on प्रकृति . 
किसान becomes helpless during प्राकृतिक प्रकोप such as बाढ़ , , drought etc. . 
Mostly small and marginal farmers are suffering due to the incessant increase in मूल्य of उर्वरकों , and कृषि यन्त्रों and accidental natural calamities but their problems have not changed much from the past few decades . 
If we तो to increase कृषि उत्पादन in सही दिशा then we तो to pay विशेष ध्यान on agricultural problems . 
उत्पादन in देश in the year 2001-02 was 731 million 731 लाख टन . 
Uttar Pradesh is प्रथम राज्य of उत्तर प्रदेश देश to have उत्पादन . 
पंजाब and हरियाणा come sequentially after इसके बाद . 
राज्य are there in भारत to have कृषि उत्पादकता . 
Because of निम्मलिखित कारणों कृषि उत्पादकता is les . 
Majority of अधिकांश किसान in देश are less educated and they have a traditional perspective towards धर्म , , जाति आदि etc. because of which they are afraid of adopting modern techniques . 
There are two major problems of कृषि in देश . 
The first is that भार on पहली कृषि should be lowered and दूसरी लोगों should be engaged in दूसरे उद्योगों than पहली कृषि . 
Majority of ज्यादातर किसान in भारत are poor . 
Further because of spending अधिक समय in कृषि उत्पादन , ill-effects of divine outbreaks on कृषि and seasonal employment of कृषि they could not नहीं मिल पाता है वित्त in पर्याप्‍त मात्रा . 
कमी of वित्त affects कृषि and reduces पैदावार . 
Some institutional causes are also found which are responsible in bringing कमी in कृषि उत्पादकता . 
Because of the small land holdings the per hectare production of agriculture is very low . 
आकार of average land holdings in अन्य देशों is 1.51 hectare while in अन्य देशों such as in आस्ट्रेलिया , it is even less than 188 1.51 हेक्टेयर and 32 % holdings are within 1.51 हेक्टेयर . 
कृषि उत्पादकता has also reduced because of some major techniques . 
यह is एक सच्चाई that फसल could not be grown properly on भूमि without बिना पानी . 
That is why कृषि उत्पादन भी gets प्रभावित because of lack of सुविधायें . 
Only 33.3 % share of कृषि योग्य भूमि in our country is सिंचित , the rest 66.7 % share is unirrigated and dependent on monsoons , that is why there is कमी in उत्पादकता . 
एक प्रमुख कारण behind निम्न कृषि उत्पादकता in our country is inability to protect फसलों from insects and रोगों . 
16 % share of कुल खाद्यान्नों gets कीड़ो - मकोड़ो by insects प्रतिवर्ष . 
महत्त्वपूर्ण कारण of reduction in भारत is that because of the less availability of अच्छे उन्नतशील बीजों in देश , किसान are unable to utilize होने properly . 
Secondly , because of the orthodox belief of भारतीय किसान they make प्रयोग भी of good and useful रासायनिक खादों . 
देश is also making प्रयोग भी of रासायनिक खादों . 
कृषि उत्पादकता of देश gets lowered also because of प्राकृतिक कारणों भी . 
Indian agriculture is dependent on भारतीय कृषि प्रकृति especially on वर्षा , , वर्षा , are uncertain , untimely and uncommon which affects उत्पादन . 
Because of अधिक वर्षा the fertile मिट्टी of खेत gets बह जाती है , away into rivers which reduces उर्वरा of भूमि . 
Consequently स्वरुप कृषि उत्पादन gets affected . 
There are कुछ दोष in मिट्टी भी which reduces उत्पादकता . 
Defects like कमी , of नाइट्रोजन , कटाव , of भूमि , पानी and excess wasteland are found in मिट्टी of देश . 
There is विशेष महत्त्व of सिंचाई and multipurpose river valley projects in देश like भारत . 
विकास is only possible in a place which has वातावरण ही fir इसके such as वातावरण ही and वर्षा according to आवश्यकता . 
सिंचाई is एक महत्त्वपूर्ण कारक in कृषि . 
Providing जल through कृत्रिम साधनों is known as सिंचाई in खेती . 
वर्षा in भारत is through monsoon winds . 
Amount , timings and स्थान of वर्षा are all uncertain . 
Thus प्रगति on आधार of वर्षा is not possible . 
In a country like भारत where सम्पूर्ण अर्थव्यवस्था is dependent on कृषि . 
Irrigation means have महत्त्व at such such places . 
भारतीय केन्द्र सरकार has गठन some major organizations for विकास of water means . 
राष्‍ट्रीय जल विकास परिषद् - - इसकी was स्थापना in जुलाई , 1982 . 
कार्य is to determine the scope of सदुपयोग of पानी by aligning rivers . 
So पानी , reaches क्षेत्रों from क्षेत्रों . 
केन्द्रीय जल आयोग - - केन्द्रीय जल आयोग - स्थापित in 1985 is एक उच्च प्रौद्योगिक संस्था for गणित वृद्धि of water means . 
कार्य of this council is to make schemes regarding उपयोग , of water resources , संरक्षण and नियंत्रण and to co-ordinate and develop those schemes . 
उन्हें thinks and gives suggestions to the state governments for यह बाढ़ सिंचाई and shipping . 
केन्द्रीय भूमिगत जल बोर्ड - इस बोर्ड - केन्द्रीय भूमिगत जल बोर्ड - इस बोर्ड was established in 1952 but इसके साथ was पुनर्गठन with भूगर्भ सर्वेक्षण of भूमिगत जल - इकाई of भारत in 1972 . 
कार्य of इस बोर्ड is to do सर्वेक्षण concerning भूमिगत जल , determining the possibilities , मूल्यांकन and मानीटरिंग गुणवत्ता and पद्धति of भूमिगत जल . 
यह बोर्ड prepares रणनीति and कार्यक्रम related to विकास of भूमिगत जल in पूरे देश . 
The major means of agriculture in भारत are canals , विशाल मैदान are कृषि सिंचाई using canals . 
पंजाब and Haryana are प्रमुख क्षेत्र where सिंचाई is done using canals . 
There is जाल of सिंचाई using canals in इन राज्यों . 
Apart from them कुछ भागों of राजस्थान and पश्‍चिमी बंगाल are सिंचाई जाती है using canals . 
कुछ सिंचाई जाती है through canals are also done in डेल्टा क्षेत्रों of दक्षिणी भारत and river valleys . 
देश basically has दो प्रकार होती है of canals . 
Flood canals and twelve months canal - The flood canals have पानी only during ऋतु दौरान ही and the twelve months canals have पानी throughout the year . 
संख्या of twelve months canals is greater in भारत . 
There are following निम्नलिखित लाभ from सिंचाई through canals . 
It takes away अतिरिक्‍त पानी of floods . 
Agriculture becomes possible in dry areas . 
It is स्थायी व्यवस्था of यह सिंचाई . 
It increases उर्वरा of यह भूमि . 
It presents sooner and cheaper rates of सिंचाई on समतल मैदानों . 
सुविधा could be obtained . 
भय of अकाल ends . 
The following are the harms of सिंचाई using canals . 
मलेरिया spreads in नहरी क्षेत्रों . 
किसानों have dispute over नहरी पानी . 
निकटवर्ती क्षेत्रों get flooded when the canals टूटने . 
इनमें do not नहीं मिलता है required and पानी . 
Wells have been प्रयोग for सिंचाई in भारत since ancient times and today also होता आ रहा है is सबसे लोकप्रिय साधन of सिंचाई . 
Wells are primarily of two kinds-surface wells or subsurface wells or tube wells . 
The following are निम्नलिखित लाभ . 
The wells could be dug at कम लागत . 
उर्वरा of भूमि increases . 
किसान becomes self dependent in पानी . 
The following are निम्नलिखित हानियाँ भी . 
The wells also सूखा with सूखा . 
अधिक लागत of कुआ is high at the places where water level is low . 
Saline खारा पानी which is mostly found in wells . 
It is harmful for फसल . 
कृषि सिंचाई is a significant means of agriculture , पानी for कृषि सिंचाई is drawn with electricity . 
The following are निम्नलिखित लाभ of सिंचाई using tube wells . 
श्रम is बच जाता है , and they do not need to keep many cattle . 
The tube wells act as complementary at जिन स्थानों where there is less amount of पानी . 
Well पानी is more profitable in comparison to पानी because होता है , contains कई तत्त्व and रसायन which maintain the fertility of भूमि . 
व्यय is less here . 
इससे will lead to certain and सिंचाई . 
It is appropriate for खेती . 
यह is अन्तर्गत एक कमजोरी of कृषि सिंचाई under tube wells is that यह requires अत्यधिक वित्त which किसान could not have done . 
Many significant organizations concerning कृषि विज्ञान and कृषि विज्ञान have been स्थापित . 
Which is working on व्यापक स्तर for विकास of कृषि . 
Indian council of agricultural research was गठित during कार्यकाल of भारतीय कृषि अनुसंधान परिषद् - लार्ड इरविन -LRB- 1926-1931 -RRB- in अध्यक्षता of लिनलिथगो in 1926 by शाही कृषि आयोग . 
On सिफारिशों of the council , Imperial council of ' इम्पीरियल काउन्सिल ऑफ एग्रीकल्चरल रिसर्च ' '' was स्थापना on 23 मई , , 1929 for विकास of कृषि विज्ञान and कृषि विज्ञान . 
After स्वतन्त्रता इस काउन्सिल was नाम इस काउन्सिल of agricultural research '' . 
भारतीय कृषि अनुसंधान परिषद् of agricultural research '' is a leading organization in the field of कृषि विज्ञान & प्रौद्योगिकी विकास . 
भारतीय कृषि अनुसंधान परिषद् , of agricultural research itself does कार्य of अनुप्रयोग and मत्स्यपालन आदि related to कृषि , , पशुपालन , fishery and gives सहायता and encouragement for इसके and also maintains समन्वय between them . 
There is व्यापक योगदान of agricultural University in विकास of कृषि . 
Here research and निदान related on agricultural problems are done . 
Agricultural University and कालेज are extremely important from the perspective of कृषि शोध . 
During 1901-05 कृषि कालेज were स्थापित in Pune , Kanpur , Sabaur , Nagpur , Coimbatore and ल्यालपुर -LRB- ( पाकिस्तान -RRB- in भारत . 
Then after there was सशक्‍त श्रृंखला of कृषि कालेजों . 
On the suggestion of इन्डो - अमेरिकन टीम first agricultural university was स्थापना in भारत in पंतनगर in 1960 . 
Then after संख्या increased . 
Now there are a total of 33 state agricultural universities in भारत and Imphal University is a central agricultural university . 
The research work concerning rubber , coffee and फसलों are done by the respective councils . 
As a result of हरित क्रान्ति आत्म - निर्भरता that has been achieved in फलस्वरुप खाद्यान्नों is mainly because of सफलता in विज्ञान and प्रौद्योगिकी क्षेत्र . 
Now कृषक भी of दुर्गम क्षेत्रों have also हुयी aware of लाभों of कृषि विज्ञान and कृषि विज्ञान and new and reformed techniques of agriculture and are also प्रयोग them . 
कृषि क्षेत्र has हुयी है competent because of प्रयोग of आधुनिक विज्ञान and agricultural investments and आधुनिक विज्ञान and निर्भरता of कृषि on monsoons has कम . 
The profound consequences of प्राकृतिक प्रकोपों have reduced with प्रयोग of new techniques and methods in agricultural works . 
There is relatively less श्रम on per unit production because of प्रौद्योगिकी प्रभाव of विज्ञान and विज्ञान . 
यह can हो गया है कहा जा सकता है , that यह has now हो गया है possible to have relatively more अपेक्षाकृत अधिक उत्पादन because of प्रयोग of समान श्रम . 
दूसरा प्रभाव of विज्ञान and विज्ञान on कृषि is seen in the form of क्षमता to बचत भूमि . 
किसी फसल or at least अधिक उपज of किसी फसल could be achieved on किसी भूमि इकाई . 
This means that कम भूमि is required for मात्रा of उपज than before . 
The third and तीसरा प्रमुख प्रभाव of विज्ञान and विज्ञान is seen in क्षमता to बचत समय . 
Now there is प्रचलन of बीजों with relatively less mature अवधि . 
Initially अवधि of धान , , गेहूँ , , ज्वार , , बाजरा , फसलों थी more because of which हो जाता था थी difficult to लेना फसलों in इन खेतों . 
There is सकारात्मक प्रभाव on कृषि उत्पादन and कृषि उत्पादन and तत्व of जोखिम has कम . 
There has been समावेश of new agricultural investments and परिवर्तन in संरचना . 
Soil is देन of मृदा प्रकृति in which significant properties are present . 
The crop gets प्रभावित by नत्रजन , , फास्फोरस and potash and घुलनशील लवण आदि . 
The element which lacks in मिट्टी . 
उपज स्तर of production can be वृद्धि with अतिरिक्‍त आपूर्ति . 
मृदा परीक्षण is एक महत्त्वपूर्ण साधन in intelligent balanced and कुशल प्रयोग of उर्वरकों and take अधिकतम लाभ from them . 
विज्ञान and विज्ञान has महत्त्वपूर्ण योगदान in that उस सम्बन्ध therefore soil test is a integral element of किसी योजना of परीक्षण कृषि विकास . 
There are 454 प्रयोगशालायें हैं in देश out of which 106 are चल प्रयोगशालायें हैं . 
In भारत 454 soil testing research institutions have been स्थापित at विभिन्न क्षेत्रों out of which 106 are चल research institutions . 
Currently विज्ञान and विज्ञान has become एक सशक्‍त माध्यम of testing ground water source . 
यह कार्य can be easily done with प्रयोग .

In the contemporary scenario majority of अधिकतर ग्रामीण आबादी and families engaged in खेती have stood up with सहकारिता आन्दोलन साथ .

The National and regional governments from समय -झौईण् समय to समय -झौईण् समय have undertaken कदम to gather जानकारी regarding दोषों of कृषि विपणन and their prevention . 
For the first time the major suggestions given by सर्वप्रथम शाही कृषि आयोग in 1928 for सुधार of विपणन प्रणाली are as follow . 
Appointment of trained and skilled प्रशिक्षित कुशल विपणन अधिकारियों . 
सर्वेक्षण विभिन्न कृषि उत्पादों . 
Establishing regulated markets . 
To get rid off सहकारी विपणन restrictions किसानों should first organize their co-operative marketing committees . 
The committees save कृषकों from शोषण of व्यापारियों , reduces the monopoly of mediators and increase the power of कृषकों bargaining . 
They उपलब्ध परिवहन and सुविधायें of कृषि उत्पादों . 
विपणन and निरीक्षण निदेशालय was स्थापना in 1935 by भारतीय प्रशासन . 
The royal agricultural commission -LRB- 1928 -RRB- and केन्द्रीय बैंकिंग जाँच समिति had संस्तुति for स्थापना of इस निदेशालय . 
Since July , 1958 कार्यालय of निदेशालय has been transferred from नागपुर to Faridabad . 
Currently यह is कार्यरत as अन्तर्गत विपणन and निरीक्षण निदेशालय under ministry of rural reconstruction .

स्थिति of Indian agricultural laborers is very deplorable . 
Because of very less न्यूनतम मजदूरी काफी निम्न of these laborers is very low . 
ये लोग arrange their two square meal by काम in खेतों from सुबह till night . 
इनके सामने face विभिन्न प्रकार of problems . 
कृषि मजदूर spends his life in गन्दगी and mud . 
वह works with hungry stomach and वह is not even aware of relief in आँधी and धूप . 
वह grows चावल for us but वह खुद remains hungry . 
वह feeds गायों but वह does n't नहीं मिलता anythings except काँजी and पानी . 
वह fills our granaries with grains but भरता वर्ष भर asks for राशन . 
वह persistently cuts wood and fills पानी for them . 
Who have become rich because of his hard work . 
दशा is shocking and lamentable story . 
There is scarcity of associate domestic industrial affairs in गाँवों . 
If फसल gets destroyed because of बाढ़ , , famine etc. then हो जाए , becomes difficult for the farmers to survive . 
Majority of the farmers in भारत शोषण to निम्न वर्ग . 
That is why सामाजिक स्तर always remains low . 
During नियोजन काल दौरान there was व्यापक विकास of तकनीकी in क्षेत्र , Because of प्रयोग of machines in कृषि unemployment among अशिक्षित कृषि श्रमिकों is बढ़ जाने which is एक गंभीर समस्या for them . 
Housing problem - समस्या - भूमिहीन श्रमिकों do not have their own houses . 
They take अनुमति of the land owners and built huts on बेकार भूमि and stays . 
As a return they have to be forced laborers at the land owner 's यहाँ . 
Physical , social , moral and मर्यादा end when several persons stay under the same hut . 
Lack of संगठन - There is संगठन of Indian agricultural laborers . 
that is why that are unable to make any deals with their land owners regarding मजदूरी आदि . 
Seasonal employment - रोजगार - कृषि श्रमिक do not नहीं मिल पाता है काम throughout पूरे साल . 
according to द्वितीय कृषि जाँच समिति a temporary male labor gets औसतन of 197 दिन काम annually out of which for 197 दिन वह works for himself and the rest 197 दिन वह remains unemployed , Thus in वर्ष children मिलता हैं , 197 दिन and women मिलता हैं , 197 दिन काम respectively . 
Thus औसत of वार्षिक आय remains low . 
स्तर of मजदूरी - स्तर of औद्योगिक श्रमिकों is very less than औद्योगिक श्रमिकों . 
There are दो कारण behind इसके Increase in संख्या of landless laborers and अभाव of non agricultural jobs in ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों . 
कम मजदूरी leave a bad impact on स्वास्थ्य and कार्यक्षमता of the laborers . 
Indebtedness - भार of ऋण keeps बढ़ता जा रहा है on the laborer as आय is not according to ऋणग्रस्तता - आवश्यकता . 
Because of the indebtedness वह hesitates in dealing with the land owners for मजदूरी . 
Despite working for श्रमिक जीवन भर for the land owner 's , the labor does n't get freed from the debt . 
नारी of बाल श्रम and बाल श्रम - The children and wives of laborers are compelled to मजबूरन कार्य to पूरा their needs . 
The women and बाल श्रमिकों are दी जाती है कम मजदूरी after making them काम for extra hours . 
Thus शोषण of child and woman laborers is समस्या of कृषि क्षेत्र . 
निम्न सुझाव are दिए जा सकते हैं to improve the economic and social स्थिति of कृषि श्रमिकों .

न्यूनतम मजदूरी has been fixed .

विकास - of small and cottage उद्योगों - There is आवश्यकता to redevelop उद्योगों of देश .

Therefore it should be noted . 
विभिन्न प्रकार of प्रयास were made after स्वतंत्रता by भारतीय प्रशासन to improve स्थिति of laborers which as as follows . 
Distribution of भूमि - वितरण - सरकार has बल इस प्रयास that भूमि will होगी , available as फलस्वरुप of of सुधारों such as उच्चतम सीमा of खेतों which means the useless and barren भूमि will होगी , made arable , will होगी , distributed among कृषि श्रमिकों ही . 
So far they have received 69 million hectare भूमि . 
5.6 million भूमि received as फलस्वरुप of उच्चतम सीमा of भूमि has been distributed among कृषि श्रमिकों ही only . 
दासता of slavery - उन्मूलन - भारतीय संविधान has done दासता of the slavery of कृषि श्रमिकों . 
Assistance is being provided to improve अवस्था of कृषि श्रमिकों and to help them lead स्वतंत्रतापूर्वक जीवन . 
In 1976 bonded labor system act was passed . 
With which India became free from समस्या of bonded labor . 
आन्दोलन - Acharya Vinova bhave started आन्दोलन for भूमिहीन कृषि श्रमिकों in 1951 . 
उद्देश्य of इस आन्दोलन was to लेकर lands from the land owners as per their wish and बाँट it to कृषि श्रमिकों . 
As फलस्वरुप of इस आन्दोलन roughly 68 million लगभग 68 लाख एकड़ भूमि was collected out of which 15 million लगभग 68 लाख एकड़ भूमि was वितरित among भूमिहीन कृषकों . 
ग्रामीण औद्योगिकीकरण भी - ग्रामीण औद्योगिकीकरण भी was also दिया गया है काफी महत्त्व in the schemes . 
It is also essential in the current scenario . 
Assistance is दी जाती है in गाँवों for स्थापना of कुटीर उद्योगों . 
Rural industrial settlements have been build in many development boards . 
As a result फलस्वरुप कृषि श्रमिकों मिल जाते हैं , अधिक अवसर of रोजगार and निर्भरता of खेती reduces . 
Basic credential committees were just fulfilling 3 % share of बुनियादी साख in 1954 , Then after the share of co-operative committees in बुनियादी साख increased to 25 % till 1969 and till 1985 इसके became 25 % . 
It is clear that still the money lenders have great belief in ग्रामीण साख व्यवस्था . 
कारण for majority of the drawbacks of primary agricultural credit committees are . 
The management board of अकुशल प्रबन्ध समितियों do not have ज्ञान ही of co-operative principles . 
The exploiter section grows when there is no check on the lordship of निहित स्वार्थों and sets प्रभाव . 
निरीक्षण and auditing work of the committees are not adequate and satisfying . 
किसान of weaker section are mostly neglected . 
The feeling of मितवययिता and बचत has not विकास in सदस्यों of समितियों . 
ऋणों are less used in productive works which is दुष्परिणाम of not keeping eye on ऋणों . 
There is अभाव of co-ordination among the credit organizations . 
The doubt of competition among the government institutions and व्यापारिक बैंकों is बढ़ती जा रही है , while it is utmost essential to keep तालमेल between both the institutions . 
विकास of committees in विभिन्न राज्यों have been uneven . 
प्रदत्त ऋण are inadequate . 
Looking at ऋण आवश्यकताओं of the debts the debt amount is even less than the minimum credit needs . 
Thus निर्भरता of कृषकों on exploiting money lenders still exists . 
ऋण नीति adopted by most of the committees is contaminated . 
The committees न तो adopted फसल ऋण प्रणाली nor न तो they made ऋण नीति liberal and practical . 
प्रचलन of ऋण on जमानत of भूमि is deeply rooted . 
There is unnecessary delay in ऋण वितरण . 
There is अभाव of समन्वय between कृषि साख and marketing practices . 
केन्द्रीय and राज्य सहकारी बैंकों should be quickly reformed and the weak committees should be stopped . 
The committees should emphasize on quickening deposits . 
ऋण प्रणाली should be सुधार . 
There should be व्यवस्था of ऋण in the form of वसूली उपज and व्यवस्था should be adopted . 
ऋणों should be उपयोग in productive works and they should be checked . 
The personal treasures of co-operative committees should be मजबूत . 
साख should be associated to उत्पादन and marketing works . 
The volunteer management board of the committees should be properly educated and trained . 
पारस्परिक समन्वय should be set between co-operative credit committees and व्यापारिक बैंकों . 
तीव्र आवश्यकता of पर्याप्‍त वृद्धि in सुरक्षित कोष should be बल . 
These committees should जायें विकसित in the form of ग्रामीण बैंकों from time to time so that they उपलब्ध विभिन्न प्रकार of banking services to both agriculturists and non-agriculturists . 
निरन्तर गंभीर प्रयास are required to कम ऋण . 
For this , व्यवस्था of associating उत्पादक ऋणों and credit with विपणन and उत्पाद उत्पादक ऋणों in the form of उत्पाद can हो सकता है effective . 
At any cost the moneylenders and अन्य निहित स्वार्थी तत्वों with vested interests should not be made सदस्य of committees and the intelligent leaders should be given समुचित अवसर दिये जायें . 
सदस्यों of smaller and weaker sections should be प्रोत्साहित so that they are सेवा in बेहतर ढंग . 
किसानों should जाये provided with new and best प्रकार of उपभोक्‍ता सामग्रियो , उपभोक्‍ता सामग्रियो should जाये नियमित आपूर्ति regularly at cheap rates . 
ऋण प्रणाली should be simple , useful and workable in कम से कम समय . 
In October , 1985 a meeting was held in अध्यक्षता of central agriculture minister in order to केन्द्रीय कृषि मन्त्री the problems of co-operative institutions and कृषि ऋण . 
Here discussions were held on विशेष कार्यक्रमों and providing ऋण for weaker sections and debt related crimes in co-operative institutions . 
The important resolutions consisted of strengthening primary agricultural debt committees , कठोर कार्यवाही against those who intentionally do not return ऋण and कम्प्यूटराइजेशन of figures in co-operative institutions .

After the completion of 60 years of 20th century , fast growing population and up to some extent capitalism pressurized to develop a system of उत्पादन . 
During 1960 decade , अन्य उत्पादकता लगभग rapidly increased because of the use of hybrid seeds , chemical fertilizers , pesticides and means of irrigation in हरित क्रांति बाद adopted for food . 
After the green revolution other productions almost became double and हो गई became able to fulfill the requirements of growing population . 
But because of the use of chemical fertilizers soil fertility started decreasing . 
Hybrid Varieties were sensitive for ये कीट . 
Initially इन कीटों were in control because of उपयोग of traditional methods . 
In order to reduce the effect of कीटों , pesticides were used in more quantity . 
Because of which our atmosphere started मिलने लगे polluted and pests developed the resistance towards Pesticide . 
The quality of water was also effected severely as the chemical elements got dissolved with water combined into water sources . 
आधुनिक कृषि started depending more on external inputs such as chemical fertilizers , pesticide , herbicide and machinery . 
The major ill effects of modern farming include soil erosion , कमी of water availability , soil salinity , chemical fertilizers and pollution due to pesticides . 
Quality of food has reduced because of the use of pesticides and polluted water . 
The solution of these all problems lies in परम्परागत खेती only . 
Crop producers no more have the same taste which producers of परम्परागत कृषि had . 
Man has been stabilizing रासायनिक कृषि by following the traditional knowledge of रासायनिक कृषि , correcting previous errors and also on the basis of his experience . 
The negative and harmful aspects of chemical farming were first identified by the farmers of European countries like - Germany , France etc. . 
In 1923 Dr. Rudolf Steiner , an Austrian scientist was the first person to tell that chemical farming along with agriculture destroys the thinking power of human .

The enemy pests are efficiently managed .

खण्ड निर्धारित कीमत of वस्तु in बाजार is known as बाजार . 
In any economy कीमत performs an important function of efficient allocation of संसाधनों . 
Unlike किसी साधारण बाजार , कार्य of किसी साधारण बाजार is not only limited to pricing but also to प्रदान risk management solutions to लोगों .

अंतरराष्‍ट्रीय स्तर of बाजार is five to twenty times more than बाजार . 
फ्यूचर्स are bought and sold in बाजार . 
Thus , commodity futures is उत्पाद of फ्यूचर्स डेरिवेटिव श्रृंखला where कमोडिटी is कमोडिटी rather than a security . 
Price fluctuation of फ्यूचर्स depends on underlying commodity price fluctuation . 
While on the analysis of परिभाषा , commodity futures looks like फ्यूचर्स फारवर्ड प्रसंविदा , लक्षण भी of its distinction with फ्यूचर्स फारवर्ड प्रसंविदा also appear . 
Evidently , in the case of फ्यूचर्स not only कमोडिटी , कीमत or volumes are preset , but गुणवत्ता and location of their delivery etc. are also preset . 
One of the two parties is definitely एक्सचेंज . 
Thus एक्सचेंज acts as a central counter-party . 
कोश भी is also संपोषित by the Commodity Exchange , which is similar to the fund , संपोषित by कमोडिटी एक्सचेंज . 
प्रत्येक ऐसी प्रसंविदा represents एक निश्‍चित मात्रा of वस्तु whose transaction is done at a predetermined location . 
यह प्रसंविदा is transferable and with the passage of समय , due to परिवर्तनों , in माँग and पूर्ति of वस्तु , कीमत of यह प्रसंविदा also varies , with परिवर्तनों , in कीमत . 
इस प्रसंविदा can be freely bought and बेचा जा सकता है in the secondary market with मूल्य . 
मूल्य ही of the object during किसी भी समय also determines मूल्य ही of प्रसंविदा . 
इस प्रकार of फ्यूचर्स , always happens through कमोडिटी एक्सचेंज rather than being directly between any two individuals . 
Only कमोडिटी एक्सचेंज ही is responsible for भुगतान or डिलीवरी of वस्तु . 
Actually फ्यूचर्स is प्रयोग for speculation or प्रबंधन , and वास्तविक डिलीवरी are non-existent . 
Due to बाजार उत्पादक of commodities can sell उत्पाद at निर्धारित मूल्य before उत्पाद . 
On दूसरी ओर , consumers can buy the commodities at preset prices before तारीख पहले ही of consumption . 
Thus not only the producer escapes from जोखिम भी of संभावित वृद्धि in prices but consumers also बचता from जोखिम भी of संभावित वृद्धि in prices . 
बाजार presents a very scientific and just प्रक्रिया of न्यायपूर्ण जोखिम प्रबंधन which fulfills जरूरतों of उत्पादकों and consumers . 
By putting संबंधित वस्तु in go-downs approved by एक्सचेंज for longer period , transaction to sell at बेहतर कीमतों in वायदा बाजार can be carried . 
Fluctuation in फ्यूचर्स बाजार are not so intense as they are in फ्यूचर्स बाजार . 
Hence , commodity market transaction is relatively safe . 
By balancing माँग and पूर्ति of various commodities , यह बाजार determines an undisputed and acceptable कीमत very transparently . 
If किसी सौदे is निबटान without delivery opposite to किसी सौदे then sales tax does not apply . 
Sales tax applies only in those cases where डिलीवरी is ली or दी जाती है . 
Usually it is जिम्मेदारी of यह विक्रेता to collect and भुगतान the sales tax . 
From 1 जून , , सरकार has provided व्यवस्था of commodity transaction tax . 
The covenants in NCDEX expires on the 20th of हर महीने . 
If there is a holiday on 20th then तारीख will होगी एक दिन before तारीख . 
In the case of वस्तु with greater fluctuation values , margin amount is increased . 
In addition to प्रबंधन , डेरिवेटिव उत्पादों are largely प्रयोग by speculators . 
The truth is that वर्ग is the backbone of any future-market . 
बाजार can not be imagined without speculators . 
सटोरिया वर्ग is सटोरिया वर्ग which manages निहित जोखिम inherent in the actual commercial transactions but assesses निहित जोखिम and दिशा already present in बाजार , प्रयास to get benefits out of होने . 
The class of प्रबंधन is ignorant of वर्ग माँग and पूर्ति and other subtle factors affecting कीमतों , and does not have the skills to analyze concerning data . 
वह is engaged in commercial transactions and रुचि lies only in the prevention of जोखिमों संबंधित to those transactions . 
In contrast , speculator class has गहरी समझ of वर्ग बाजार and the various factors that influencing इसके . 
By closely studying the ever-changing conditions of माँग and पूर्ति of किसी भी वस्तु at regional , national and अन्तरराष्‍ट्रीय स्तर , वर्ग क्षेत्रीय , gets skilled in the accurate assessment आधारित on its solid inferences . 
लाभ or हानि made by him depends on शुद्धता of market values estimates . 
So अत : वह does इस कार्य with पूरी व्यावसायिक लगन . 
वह deals in बाजारों on आधार of these estimations . 
Since सटोरिया वर्ग is सटोरिया वर्ग and 90 % of 90 % बाजार is संचालित by सटोरिया वर्ग only , therefore , market values and भावी दिशाओं indicated by the transactions done by सटोरिया वर्ग can be considered as संकेत . 
वर्ग ही only provides वांछित तरलता to बाजार and freedom to सौदे on different prices to actual business risk managers . 
वर्ग provides संतुलन to बाजार rather than imbalance . 
Thus we देखते हैं that spectacular class actually saves बाजार from rapid and असंतुलनों and provides it संतुलन and presumability . 
In राय of experts कारण behind ever increasing inflation is वृद्धि in कीमत of आयातित कच्चे तेल and कमी in पूर्ति . 
The common people suffering from continuously rising prices , estimate that the high levels of betting in बाजार is responsible for इसके . 
अभिजीत सेन कमेटी appointed by Parliament has made यह clear in रिपोर्ट that फ्यूचर्स व्यवसाय and कीमतों have no correlation . 
कीमतों are concerned with rapidly rising माँग than पूर्ति , which is एक विश्‍व स्तरीय मुद्दा सीमित only to भारत ही . 
In addition to the various segments of समाज , विभिन्न वर्गों also gets फायदों from बाजार . 
The banks providing बैंक ऋण can save themselves up to काफी हद from एनपीए by dealing equivalent to मूल्य of बैंक ऋण in futures वायदा बाजार . 
ऐसा is specifically possible in those situations when उधारकर्ता fails in विशेषकर ऋण due to हानि because of the fall in prices . 
After passing of प्रस्तावित संशोधन in Banking Regulation Act , बैंकों will get अनुमति to trade in वायदा बाजार . 
In उस स्थिति बैंक would not only be able to do proper diversification of their investment portfolio on behalf of clients but also by proprietary deals . 
Through such transactions आय भी can also be obtained by बैंकों . 
As a result of तरलता thus witnessed in बाजार बैंक may transfer जोखिम by हस्तांतरण the warehouse receipts in बाजार . 
Globally , आकार is दस गुना more than आकार of वस्तु बाजार . 
धारणा of people may differ but experts believe that generally future trade is not responsible for the fluctuation of कीमतों in बाजार .

कला of making इत्र or perfumes is quite ancient .

Imn Rawalin -LRB- 810-617 BC -RRB- who था , बादशाह of Faristan used to submit 30,000 बोतल of rose water प्रतिवर्ष in the treasure of गुलाब जल बगदाद in the form of tax . 
In भारत , सुगंधित पदार्थों are उपयोग during religious purposes in sutras and vedas . 
बौद्ध धर्मावलम्बी used to bathe the statue of their god with सुगंधित जल .

During Gupta period -LRB- 300-400 ) -RRB- perfumed cosmetics , सुगंधित तेल , , kajal , cream etc. were उपयोग . 
Information regarding भारतीय सुगंधित पदार्थों exists in Pali and Islamic books . 
Mughal rulers had helped in विकास of सुगंधित पदार्थों in भारत . 
Abul Fazal in अकबरी ' पुस्तक Ainey Akbari ' writes that अकबर the great was extremely fond of सुगंधियों .

सुगंधित तेल vaporize very quickly which can होते हैं easily अलग with the help of वाष्प . 
There are several methods of आसवन . 
इनका are उपयोग ध्यान प्रकृति of उत्पाद in ध्यान . 
Following measures should be essentially taken while doing आसवन . 
तापमान should हो kept low as far as possible . 
Lowering of तापमान is extremely important because at तापमान विविध रासायनिक घटक in सुगंधित तेलों that is at तापमान पदार्थ of सुगंधित तेलों lose their stability . 
विधि of कच्चे पदार्थ should होना चाहिए carried in favorable conditions . 
जिस कच्चे पदार्थ out of which सुगंधित तेल is to नहीं होना चाहिए सुगंधित तेल should not नहीं होना चाहिए in powder form . 
Majority of अधिकांश घटक , of सुगंधित तेलों , except few are soluble in गर्म जल . 
Hence very less अत : थोड़ी मात्रा of सुगंधित तेल is obtained when आसवन is carried by adding अधिक जल in अत : थोड़ी मात्रा of कच्चे माल . 
यह विधि of जल आसवन is extremely important . 
सुगंधित तेलों contain एक निश्‍चित मात्रा of इस्टर . 
Longer duration of आसवन and by taking अधिक मात्रा of जल while distilling , the उपस्थित इस्टर present in सुगंधित तेलों break into अम्ल and alcohol which yields very less सुगंधित तेलों . 
आसवन separates अधिक मात्रा of इस्टर over आसवन is more significant as compared to आसवन . 
जल आसवन should हो सके avoided as far as possible or they should हो सके carried for जितने कम समय . 
आसवन is not अच्छी विधि to obtain सुगंधित तेलों from flowers . 
विधि or विधि should be only उपयोग to obtain तेल from flowers . 
Both these methods are good but flower and अच्छी विधियां is the best in सबसे अच्छी because अच्छी विधियां gives अच्छी किस्म of तेल and in अधिक मात्रा . 
But विधि ही should होता है only उपयोग to obtain सुगंधित तेलों from flowers at industrial level because विधि ही yields good quality and more अधिक मात्रा of सुगंधित तेलों . 
तापक्रम भी can also be easily नियंत्रित in विधि . 
कच्चे माल should होना चाहिए in इस दशा that होना चाहिए completely gets प्रत्येक कण with कच्चे माल while वाष्प जल or आसवन and होना चाहिए should निकाल दें all the elements of कच्चे माल from उपस्थित सुगंधित तेल . 
There is आवश्यकता to कुचलने or cut कोमल भागों , of फूल , , पत्तियां , , घास and to obtain सुगंधित तेल from them . 
But कठोर भागों of पौधों such as wood , बीज , , फल , , मूल or peel should be काटना in small pieces or crushed in order to obtain सुगंधित तेल from them so that more and more walls of कोशामिनी टूट जाए and सुगंधित तेल easily comes out with वाष्प साथ . 
After properly cutting or crushing कच्चे माल they should be धो लें with साफ पानी so that perfumed oil does not evaporate by being vapor . 
Before उपयोग the roots of ओरिस , leaves of वनिला and roots of वनिला the pieces should हो जायें properly mature . 
भाग of कुछ पौधों or कुछ पौधों सुरक्षित during the time of harvesting are beneficial in the form of कच्चे माल . 
जिरेनियम and osimum filimund - फिलिमन्ड - कैरिकम पौधों are उपयोग in dry form to obtain सुगंधित तेल from them because अधिक मात्रा of सुगंधित तेल is सुगंधित तेल in dry form . 
कच्चे पदार्थ should न होने पायें , saved so that रेसीनीफिकेशन and other chemical processes do not occur because all these processes destroy मात्रा of उपस्थित सुगंधित तेल in कच्चे पदार्थ . 
Therefore यह is extremely important to save कच्चे माल प्रभाव to get अत : अच्छी किस्म and अधिक मात्रा of सुगंधित तेल . 
विधि is the most easy and less expensive विधि to obtain सुगंधित तेल and using विधि सुगंधित तेल can be सुगंधित तेल from सारे संसार . 
कच्चे माल are boiled with अधिक मात्रा of पानी साथ in इस विधि , . 
When कच्चे पदार्थ are डाल देने in पानी they float at the top or डूब जाता है but space is left for vaporization . 
इस विधि yields अच्छी किस्म and अधिक मात्रा of तेल when worked carefully but when कच्चा माल comes into संसर्ग of गर्म भाग then वास्तविक गंध of तेल gets lost with the heat of कच्चा माल . 
जल स्रोत are not made during सम्पर्क of कच्चा पदार्थ with वाष्प while extracting तेल using इस विधि . 
Another obstacle while using इस विधि is सुगंधित तेल , whose boiling point is more or which are soluble in जल can not be easily सुगंधित तेल , using इस विधि . 
विधि of distillation yields मात्रा of प्राप्‍त तेल and समय involved is less as compared to other methods and हाइड्रोलाइनिस is also more . 
Thus दर of क्रिया should be organized so that more and more युक्‍त सुगंधित तेल is obtained . 
आसवन क्रिया done at निम्न दर can होती है harmful because तेल बाहर can not होती है तेल बाहर properly from कच्चे पदार्थों and मात्रा of तेल बाहर obtained is negligible . 
क्रिया is also very less in क्रिया carried at निम्न दर . 
जल and vapor distillation method is particularly popular among the industrialists and industries उत्पादन तेल is विधि थोड़ी मात्रा . 
The distillation equipment is very small here which is directly heated using fire . 
Big distillation pots are heated through जैकेट or closed helix . 
The surface pots are रखा जाता है on तलीपात्र during क्रिया so that they remain away from जल . 
इस पात्र is dried with the help of वाष्प . 
पदार्थ to होना चाहिए उपयोग as कच्चे माल should neither होना चाहिए powdered nor cut into small pieces . 
Hence अत : कच्चे माल that is roots , stems or peels etc. should होना medium shaped . 
The distillation process of तेलों with high boiling point takes longer duration . 
वाष्प आसवन : - आसवन During इस विधि of आसवन : - आसवन वाष्प more than अति उच्च दाब of वातावरण enters into पात्र . 
During इस आसवन ताप of पात्र is much more than ताप of वाष्प . 
अति ऊष्मित वाष्प has यह क्षमता to cool that पात्र and तेल is obtained . 
विच्छेदन takes place because of वाष्प . 
In भारत वाष्प आसवन is generally उपयोग to obtain turpentine , sandalwood and vetivar तेल . 
Squeezing विधि : - : विधि : - is उपयोग to obtain सगंध from पौधों of lemon family . 
सुगंधित तेल from नींबू and वरगोवोट are obtained using इस विधि . 
तीन प्रकार of methods are उपयोग for this . 
Sponge Process : This is एक अत्यंत प्राचीन विधि . 
फलों are काट दिया जाता है into pieces using an axe in इस विधि and सार तत्व are brought out using a spoon . 
Now the peels are भिगो or डाल दिया जाता है , into पानी , तेल comes out . 
The peels are kept between स्पंज बीच to extract तेल from them . 
रस thus extracted is collected and finally filtered . 
प्राप्‍त तेल contains high value . 
Kule क्यूल विधि : - : In क्यूल विधि : - एक धातु has a hollow pipe which contains spines . 
फलों have to cross these spines only because of which टूट जाती हैं and the fluid gets collected at the surface . 
इस विधि yields even less कम मात्रा of तेल than इस विधि . 
Several machines have विकास in अमरीका and इटली on this principle . 
Extraction through विलायकों : Despite being विधि यह is not satisfying in majority of the matters but सिद्ध to होने भी harmful because of the presence of वाष्प in सुगंधित तेलों the temporary perfumed chemicals are lost . 
Sometimes मात्रा भी of तेल obtained is also very less . 
Hence in order to get away from these shortcomings विधि is उपयोग . 
इस विधि is known as विलायक निष्कर्षण which is satisfying as compared to इस विधि in majority of the cases . 
विलायक उपयोग in इस विधि are वाष्पशील or non वाष्पशील .
