In भारतीय परिस्थिति with taking how much कितनी व्यय क्षमता or जीवन स्तर has धनी वर्ग been परिभाषित ? 
What is संख्या of धनी किसानों in विभिन्‍न राज्यों ? 
On इन सवालों , professors have not written एक भी किताब yet . 
Any less literate , अर्धशिक्षित किसान नेता if will want to तय नीति on इन सवालों , then after reading which book he will देगा राय ? 
Beside supreme being which kind of resource of ज्ञान उसके पास can have . 
In Hindustan leftists especially socialist प्रयास to किसानों as a poor class after आजादी बाद . 
लोहिया had लिखा था a long essay about the problems of किसानों in that उन्होंने had लिखा था the things to adopt a new perspective and विकेन्द्रित व्यवस्था . 
The Facet of communists towards the problems of किसानों was full of contradictions . 
They assume किसानों low bourgeoisie ' -LRB- petty bourgeoisie -RRB- . 
But कम्युनिस्ट or समाजवादी , , anyone from both , did not run आन्दोलन in देश . 
There था a vision-problem in कम्युनिस्टों and socialist have never been अच्छे संगठनकर्ता also . 
कम्युनिस्टों established अच्छा संगठन of industrial worker , but socialists neither established worker-organization and nor farmer-organization . 
At इस समय , among the communists and socialists , no one has संगठन of किसानों in देश . 
But between this the self motivated movements have raised . 
But beside socialists and communists a powerful class of rich and baron किसानों always प्रयास to do राजनीति from the side of किसानों . 
स्वार्थ नहीं था in , to raise समस्याओं of किसानों . 
ये wanted that any progressive solution should not come out of the land-problem , कानून like बटाईदारी of the border or bataidari should not हो सके लागू thus स्वार्थ could हो सके saved . 
Thus in different parties they had a strong lobby -LRB- प्रभावकारी समूह which make the pressure -RRB- . 
But गरीब किसानों न तो न तो कोई लाबी ही and they न तो get unified . 
देखें वैचारिक पक्ष . 
आर्थिक नीति , of पश्‍चिमी देशों , is आधारित on इस धारणा that the important economical work will होगा , done in औद्योगिक क्षेत्र , बड़ा हिस्सा of आबादी will indulge in औद्योगिक क्षेत्र itself . 
In खेती is a subsidiary activity , very few बहुत थोड़े लोग are indulged in इस क्षेत्र . 
in those , खेती , runs on प्रणाली of व्यापार , after loss in that , government fulfills . 
ब्रिटेन like ब्रिटेन does not take चिन्ता of इस बात that अनाज is produced at यहाँ or not . 
उद्योगपति and किसान , , for both of them व्यापारी is necessary . 
उद्योगपति keeps nailing व्यापारियों व्यापारियों earns less benefit in comparision of उद्योगपति but by बेचकर उत्पादन of किसानों वह becomes more rich than किसानों because किसानों do not have कोई नियंत्रण over that . 
यह बात is not just in यह बात of केवल अनाज , होती है also applies on व्यापारिक फसलों and forest-cultivation also . 
व्यापारी of the forest-cultivation ले जाते हैं it almost free -LRB- यानी at very low prices -RRB- and sell at very high prices , like-chironji , figs , bidi-leaf , etc. . 
After बेच their products at सर्वोच्‍च कीमत when farmer goes to खरीदने जाता है - the factory stuff-either clothes to wear or resource of उत्पादन - then उसे has to खरीदने जाता है - that at सर्वोच्‍च कीमत , because सर्वोच्‍च कीमत of किसान करखनियाँ stuff from बड़े शहर , , from बड़े शहर , to small town and from there while आते -झौईण् आते to village market increase चार बार . 
Thus , we देखते हैं that as किसान gets very low बहुत कम दाम whereas as खरीदार उसे has to pay बहुत कम दाम . 
The solution of इन समस्याओं will have to होगा - found - when किसान sell his products then उसे should मिलें , सही दाम , like this when उसे buys then उसे should मिलें , in सही दाम . 
The investment of करखनियाँ product will have to be examined . 
Meanwhile लागत of general usage things will have to be घोषणा . 
लागत of the things of the general needs should not नहीं होना चाहिए more than the margin . 
If this will होगा यह आधार of the coast , दाम of चीनी will not होगा more than two rupees per किलो . 
Till now सरकार has made आयोग to तय the cost of some products of खेती ही , which name is ' Agrictlure-Rate-Commission ' . 
In पूरे देश , there is management of सिंचाई in the just one-fourth of एक -झौईण् चौथाई खेतों ही . 
The condition of more than half of किसानों is miserable . 
They depends one प्रकृति very much that in हर तीन साल one gets affected by flood , draught or पाले and दाम भी of बीज does not return also . 
एक जोरदार माँग should होनी चाहिए there from the side of किसानों ओर of सारे देश that in एक निश्‍चित अवधि - - सात साल or - सात साल - in हर खेत the arrangement of पानी must होनी चाहिए done . 
Where ever from the side of सरकार ओर there is the arrangement of सिंचाई , there in the initial three-four years tax for सिंचाई should not applicable because यह समय is consumed by किसानों to do the new arrangements and to सीखने the new techniques of खेती . 
What will होगा , क्या नतीजा after applying इन सारी नई नीतियों in खेती , Just कल्पना होगा , . 
पहला नतीजा तो would होगा this that there will होगा जरूरत of the huge financial in दस वर्षों in the agriculture-field and for सरकार has to काटने होंगे दूसरे खर्च . 
Then this is एक महत्त्वपूर्ण सवाल that from where खर्च would be काटा जाए thus in the huge level money would be खर्च and हालत of किसानों would improve . 
उत्पादन of such things will have to be banned . 
For उदाहरण , in बाजार still food is prepared and बिकता . 
थाली of two rupees is बिकती and even hundred rupees also . 
In the five star hotels of बड़े शहरों , even plates of more than a hundred rupees are बिकती . 
If the workers of गाँवों will मिलें तो loan and दूसरी सुविधाएँ then they can also make shoes like Bata . 
That 's why in हर जिले , there will होंगे कारखाना or many factories of the shoes or in हर जिले , there will होंगे one or many factories of matchstick , clothes etc. despite of that there will होंगे just fist full factories in देश . 
In कारखाने will होगी started to open then there will होगी जरूरत to open the schools for तकनीकी प्रशिक्षण . 
In ऐसी स्थिति , girl and boys after passing मैट्रिक by connecting with the factories will सीख सकेंगे काम and later हो जा सकता है could हो जा सकता है their occupation . 
With study , they would be able to काम भी also . 
In शिक्षा , शिक्षा is separate and रोजगार is separate . 
But in बदली व्यवस्था , there will होगा opposite of इसका . 
The center of आज economy is केन्द्र शहरी उद्योग , hence everything is urban-centered . 
If खेती will हो जाए the main occupation then प्रशासन will तो to हो जाए सारी व्यवस्था which decentralized गाँव and empowered पंचायत . 
अमरीका and रूस भी want also that in मुल्क like भारत there should be केन्दित political and financial syste , they could fulfill स्वार्थ easily . 
Hence , if किसान आन्दोलन will go for long then इसलिए will not तो to fight with पूँजीपतियों and towns they इसलिए will तो to face the challenges of दुनिया superpowers also . 
In the situation when सरकार blaze हिंसा , बहस of हिंसा and अहिंसा comes up . 
भ्रम often creates doubt . 
Despite of looking this that आन्दोलन will लेगा the support of हिंसा or of अहिंसा , , we should look इस सवाल in दूसरे ढंग . 
किसान is a class which can not संघर्ष for लम्बे समय taking the support of हिंसा . 
To ऐसा so , उसे will have to unify in the different ways , will have to collect weapons , have to hide .

मलबरी रेशमकीट can be cultivated in various climate conditions and मिट्टी of विस्तृत क्षेत्र . 
By adopting बेहतर पद्धतियों itself अच्छी उपज of the cocoon can be प्राप्त . 
But for this , इसके is आवश्यक शर्त to have पत्ती of उत्तम किस्म which gives अधिक उपज . 
The upbringing of the silk worm happens in five different steps during लार्वा अवधि दौरान . 
During लार्वा अवधि it is रखा जाता है in especially made silkworm rearing shed . 
Simultaneously , to obtain रेशम , arrangement at उचित समय and गहन देखभाल is taken . 
During पूरी पालन अवधि दौरान the silkworms are taken देखभाल very carefully and for भोजन उत्तम किस्म of the mulberry leaf is इस्तेमाल . 
The formation of बेहतर वातावरण and कृमि from कृमि and diseases are the necessary conditions in their upbringing . 
To प्रदान the favorable conditions there is आवश्यकता of the rearing house and rearing equipments and instruments separately . 
In एक साल , 5 to 10 10 फसलों are nurtured and the life span of 10 फसलों is लगभग 70-80 दिनों होती है . 
प्रजाति : V-1 and S-36 are प्रजाति which gives production and are very useful for the silkworm nurturing . 
These two varieties प्रदान ये दोनों प्रजातियाँ पोषक which are very essential for लार्वा in पालन . 
पत्तियाँ are heart हृदय आकार thick and shining with हल्के हरे रंग साथ . 
In the leaves there is उच्च आर्द्रता and in that there are more nutrients . 
प्रति वर्ष on an acre about 15 thousands to 18 thousand kilo gram mulberry leaves is प्राप्त . 
V-1 Variety - प्रजाति is quite popular in खेती which was started in the year 1997 . 
Leaves are oval shaped , huge sized , thick , deep coloured containing dampness . 
In एक वर्ष , almost 20-24 thousand पत्तियाँ can be प्राप्त . 
Planting method : व्यवस्था of रोपण पद्धति : - वृक्षारोपण of the tree is done in the two rows where दूरी of -LRB- 90 +150 cm -RRB- × 90cm or 60cm × 60cm is proper . 
Due the presence of जगह between कृषि गतिविधि and for परिवहन of leaves पावर टिलर may होने उपयोग . 
Through this there is सिंचाई सुविधा of the drip irrigation . 
In every acre , वृक्षों can be planted in अधिक संख्या . 
Leaves can be ले जाया जा सकता easily and quickly , which कम संभावना of हानि .

Thus , how much the arrangement for जितनी अधिक शुद्ध वायु अन्दर to come in and impure जितनी अधिक शुद्ध वायु अन्दर to go out will होगा , there , the suffocation will होगा , that much less . 
जानवर रहते हैं happy in the pure and हवा . 
किसी तरह of बीमारी can not happen to them . 
Thus , इसलिए is necessary to have windows and रोशनदान in the cattle sheds . 
For हर एक पशु there must होनी चाहिए a window in the room . 
Looking at the length and width of the room there should होने चाहिए कई रोशनदान in the room . 
If fix the iron net in रोशनदानों then it is good . 
In the very cold weather , windows are closed during दिनों and रात and रोशनदान remain open . 
Through this , ताजी हवा भी keep on आती रहती है to the room and cold waves does not touch पशुओं also . 
If छत of the animal-shed can be made cemented , then it is good . 
Otherwise sheets of the cement or छत of खपरैल is good . 
Never इस्तेमाल tin sheets as the form of छत , because छत becomes more hot in धूप and very cold during रात of the cold . 
Due to this there is डर that animal will feel more hot during hot weather and cold during cold weather . 
If the cattle shed is earthen then दीवारों must be whitewashed दो -झौईण् तीन बार in साल . 
Once before the rain , it is necessary to whitewash . 
We also want to know this , that should the arrangement of feeding चारा हो in that room or some where else ? 
Actually बात is this that if आपके पास तो जगह , arrangement to feed पशुओं should होना चाहिए some where else . 
In जगह of the fodder feeding , it could be managed by putting छप्पर also . 
But होना is necessary to होना साफ जगह भी of चारा . 
Due to having संख्या of पशुओं more the arrangement of their food has to होने done in two rows . 
If पशुओं तो to be standing in a line , then there is एक ' खुरली ' ( toward the front . 
पिछली दीवार of खुरली would हो , little high and पिछली दीवार would हो , low , thus wile washing पानी can drain and पशु can खा सके चारा comfortably . 
Manger should हुई होनी चाहिए made of खुरली ईंटों and cement . 
जगह near खुरली पास to stand पशुओं and नाली , both should होने cemented , clearly sloped , thus can होने साफ easily by washing . 
दूरी between खुरली and नाली बीच should होनी चाहिए at least five and कम से कम साढ़े पाँच फुट . 
पेशाब and गोबर lying on फर्श near खुरली पास should be carried to the pit of खाद by washing and through नाली . 
Behind नाली पीछे there should हो रास्ता of four and four and a half चार -झौईण् साढ़े चार फुट to bring the fodder etc. and for पशुओं to go . 
To tie पशुओं instead of the rope , iron chains or neck-band should be इस्तेमाल . 
Because chains and neck-bands could be साफ by washing it , not to the ropes . 
While tieing पशुओं in front of खुरली सामने , पशुओं should be tied in the seperate parts . 
For this after हर दो पशु बाद the iron rods or the wire without prickles or the strong sticks of the wood should be put after हर दो पशु बाद . 
While feeding चारा , गायों , , buffalos , oxen should be kept separate . 
If पानी can be carried to the animal shed , then खुरलियों should be fixed in every manger . 
डाक्टर साहब said further , if पशु are more than संख्या of eight-ten , पशु will तो to होगा tied in two rows . 
In one way , keeping एक तो पशुओं face opposite , second way , putting एक तो पशुओं tail opposite . 
The way to keep पशुओं मुँह each other is cheap , but not good . 
Because in इस विधि , while feeding पशुओं they are stood on both sides of खुरली . 
Thus , at समय of चारा the breath of एक पशु go to शरीर of एक पशु . 
In such situation , if किसी पशु will तो बीमारी then हो may फैल सकती है quickly in किसी पशु and then in किसी पशु . 
In इस विधि , दूसरी बुराई is this that while eating the fodder animals fight among them . 
In these fights-quarrels पशु may injure पशु by their horns . 
The third drawback of इस विधि is this , that यह is very problematic to डालने चारा to पशुओं . 
Hence , till how extent इसलिए is possible , पशुओं should हो सके , tied facing each others tail . 
To डालने चारा in front of दोनों खुरलियों सामने ही itself रास्ते is made . 
From a broad canal itself the urine and मूत्र of पशुओं of both sides is carried to the pit of गोबर खाद . 
It is necessary to clean the feeding place at least twice in दिन . 
The small calves of गाय and भैंस should be देना चाहिए fodder etc. by अलग बाँध them separate from बड़े पशुओं . 
गाय and भैंस भी should be kept separate also . 
Not just this , बीमार पशु भी about to die and बीमार पशु भी also should have जगह to live and खाने . 
If there are more animals in the cattle shed and साँड़ भी has also been reared in that , than with जगह साथ -झौईण् साथ for साँड़ भी a separate big courtyard should हुआ है , there also . 
While आज डा0 कपिल कहा , , मैं finish आज meeting just कहकर this that while making arrangements for पशुओं always take पूरा -झौईण् पूरा ध्यान of पशुओं complete comfort . 
अच्छे नतीजे will आयेगे itself in front of आपके सामने . 
आज था दूसरा दिन of the conference . 
At ठीक समय साहब आये and शुरू to कहना , very few बहुत कम लोग among आप would be knowing that in comparison of अन्य देशों पशु are very weak .

Most of पशु are always lazy or sick .

पौष्‍टिक खुराक is that , in which विटामिन , , प्रोटीन , , minerals , fat , चर्बी , fibers and पानी should be in उचित मात्रा . 
All these are the parts of खुराक , are तत्त्व , are portions . 
In the fodder-grains , all these are in some extra amount . 
विटामिन are very essential for पशुओं in हर तरह . 
They prevent ये पशुओं from कई तरह of diseases . 
It helps very much to increase the sight of the eyes and to maintain the strength of the teeth . 
The pregnant cows-buffalos which देने दूध gets बहुत मदद from विटामिनों . 
Among विटामिन A ' और D ' is very essential for ' डी ' पशुओं . 
Vitamin ' A ' is found in हरी घास . 
Hence , मिलता है is considered very beneficial to feed पशुओं हरा चारा and हरी घास , विटामिन D ' is found in ' डी ' धूप . 
Hence , to put पशुओं in the open and the places with light is considered good for the health . 
Work to make शरीर strong is done by प्रोटीन . 
By doing काम the body of पशुओं which does rub down and टूटती , काम to पूरा that is of प्रोटीन ही . 
For the milch and pregnant cows-buffalos चारा with प्रोटीन is very essential .

What is जलवायु - जलवायु is made up of जल and air . 
In उर्दू इसे is called Abhawa . 
आब ' or ' Aab ' जल and अर्थ of ' Vayu ' or ' Hawa ' is obviously air . 
That is to say that the word climate is made from the combination of हवा and पानी . 
पानी here refers to वर्षा and हवा refers to हवा that affects वातावरण surrounding us . 
Sometimes it generates नमी around us and sometimes it generates गर्मी . 
वर्षा भी also does कुछ -झौईण् कुछ यही कार्य . 
This concludes that climate is an object that gives us गर्मी and cool . 
We अनुभव both of them ourselves . 
But there are परिवर्तन also which we अनुभव on our own . 
And there are परिवर्तन which we कुछ ऐसे भी feel . 
All such things are called जलवायु . 
Thus जुला प्रभाव of नमी and वर्षा of किसी स्थान is called जलवायु . 
There is an integral relationship between मौसम and agriculture . 
सफलता and असफलता of फसलों निर्भर on this . 
परिवर्तन in अकस्मात मौसम sometimes leads to बहुत बड़ी हानि in खेती . 
There is a terror of plants getting affected by रोगों if the weather during winters रहता है cloudy continuously for दिनों . 
It mostly catches रोग , consequently the growth of plant retards . 
Extremely cold weather and वर्षा destroys फसलें . 
This is to कहने that मौसम affects बोआई , from सिंचाई कटाई आदि till the time यह reaches घर . 
Hence होता है is essential for अत : एक सफल किसान to begin काम after पहचान मौसम . 
If there are बादल in आकाश then the plants start turning yellow and finally dry . 
फसलें can सहन मात्रा ही of एक निश्चित नमी . 
If यह नमी suddenly stops and there is मात्रा of पानी in पौधे then they stop क्रिया . 
The roots हो जाती है dry , टूट जाती है and फसल gets destroyed . 
The crop growth also stops when the moisture content is more . 
The downfall in तापक्रम affects पौधों leaves more . 
Their veins बंद काम . 
The crops are sown according to the seasons . 
ज्ञान during those seasons is essential . 
There are 6 seasons . 
Each of them lasts for two months . 
वर्ष begins from Chaitra , when सर्दी is on आगमन of ending and summer begins . 
These seasons can हो सकती है easily identified in the plains of देश . 
But there are कुछ ऐसे भाग of इसी देश which are extremely chilly for eight months and some are hot for eight months . 
Some तो year round rainfall up to 500 इंच and places like राजपूताने तो even तो 500 इंच average rainfall . 
देश is very large , कर्क रेखा of cancer passes through इसके मध्य , इसके मध्य has ocean on three sides and इसके मध्य falls on the way of monsoon winds . 
Hence जलवायु here varies at स्थान -झौईण् स्थान . 
कारण is that slanting Sun rays fall on कर्क रेखा of Cancer . 
चार महीने सूर्य shines overhead for four months वर्ष . 
इससे increases गर्मी during इन दिनों but when the Sun enters सूर्य मकर रेखा of Capricorn , प्रभाव becomes very less and the weather becomes cool . 
स्थान which will होगा more close to भूमध्य रेखा will होगा more hot and less cold and will get वर्षा . 
But as we go away from भूमध्य रेखा स्थिति will होती जायेगी विपरीत . 
That is to say the climate will होगी more cold , less hot with वर्षा . 
And even if we पहुंच जायेंगे तो धुव there will हो जाया करेगी year round cold , and sometimes snowfall will also occur . 
सूर्य will be rarely visible . 
If स्थान falls on the way of monsoon winds then rainfall is possible there but if न होने does n't fall there then स्थान becomes barren and deserted . 
राजपूताना neither falls on मानसून arising from Bay of बंगाल nor Arabian Sea . 
Consequently it remains dry . 
जलवायु in समतल मैदान is essential . 
देश is स्थित between 8 degree and 30 degree northern latitude . 
From विचार of view जलवायु should होनी चाहिए warm but this is not the situation . 
कारण is बनावट of this place . 
Because of बनावट of भूमि , जलवायु of भिन्न -झौईण् भिन्न स्थानों is different . 
Yes , the climatic conditions of मैदानों is definitely similar . 
If फसलों मिल जाता है पानी on उचित समय then उपज is good . 
But generally होता रहता है is देखा जाता है that there is always प्रकोप of rains all the times in the form of heavy rainfall , less rainfall and untimely rainfall . 
इससे damages a lot of फसल . 
These three things are harmful for खेती . 
During ऋतु due to वर्षा फसलें get बह जाती हैं away or become rotten . 
sometimes हो जाता है becomes difficult to दुस्साध्य समस्या of बीज . 
प्रकोप तो of drought is all the more dreadful . 
The leaves generally get affected by chilly weather and it stops रोक देता है of leaves . 
Because of this पत्तियाँ can not make भोजन and gradually start drying . 
Because of extreme chilly weather कभी -झौईण् कभी फसलों sometimes bear big losses . 
With the help of तापमापक we can ascertain chilly weather while before and रक्षा भी फसलों using उचित उपायों . 
If फसल are सिंचाई before the arrival of winters then फसल remain unaffected . 
प्रभाव can be forbidden up to a certain extent by ejecting धुआँ around खेत चारों ओर during winters . 
Rain Gauge - मापक - यह is a hollow instrument . 
इसमें has एक कीप from where पानी enters . 
यह कीप is attached to a glass bottle . 
पानी gets collected in the bottle through कीप . 
पानी of the glass is नापने with a measuring device . 
इस यन्त्र is kept in स्थान during rainfall so the atmospheric rain directly enters into it . 
पानी should at least be 24घंटे once in every 24 hour . 
वर्षा are जो नाप in इंचों . 
For example if there 2 inches of 2 " पानी in नपने गिलास वर्षा उस दिन will be called 2 inches only . 
Sometimes वर्षा occurs at the end of फरवरी or पहले सप्ताह of मार्च . 
इससे leads to the rotting of एकत्रित अन्न in farms . 
बीज catches एक प्रकार of black spot which reduces its rate in बाजार and स्वाद भी also becomes bitter . 
Thus अन्न are greatly affected by वर्षा until they reach घर . 
When there are हल्की वर्षा at अन्त of May after Rabi harvesting they adequately पर्याप्त सहायता in जुताई . 
Hence अत : यह is clear that rain division is more significant for खेती than मात्रा of वर्षा . 
असमय वर्षा puts बहुत ही बुरा प्रभाव on फसलों and sometimes lead to scarcity but असमय वर्षा can make कृषक rich . 
Firstly सर्व प्रथम अधिकांश कीट -झौईण् पतंग originate in the form of eggs by सर्व प्रथम अधिकांश कीट -झौईण् पतंग . 
भिन्न -झौईण् भिन्न कीट -झौईण् पतंग have different kinds of eggs . 
These eggs are round , long , triangular etc. . 
Some eggs are yellow and some are white . 
This is to कहने that eggs have अनेक रंग and colors . 
Consequently every egg gives rise to long , with many joints , crawling living being which is called ईलट or sunda . 
समय भी of egg hatching is also different . 
But it is essential to know that eggs फूटते हैं quickly in गर्मी . 
Egg hatching delays with increasing cold . 
Eggs do not eat nor drink anything but the ' insects that comes out start running here and there in खोज इधर -झौईण् उधर of भोजन . 
These insects खाते हैं the soft stem propagation , leaves and फलों when they get समय . 
आप know ' bhalu sunde ' . 
वह eats the leaves of pigeon pea , kidney bean and urad . 
The green insect which is found on the leaves of लौकी and nenua eats its leaves . 
आपको will होगा amazed to know that very soon these insects नष्ट पूरी फसल . 
That is why the form '' Sunda '' of insects is very furious . 
These insects are responsible for नष्ट फसलों . 
The gram insects eat the stems of पौधों and नष्ट समूची फसल overnight . 
प्रत्येक पतंग adds to वंश वृद्धि after copulation . 
Majority of अधिकांश नर पतंग मर जाते हैं after copulation . 
मादा पतंग होती है also face the similar situation . 
Majority of पतंग मर जाती हैं because of laying innumerable eggs . 
But as opposite to this , queen termite about whom you will learn later lives for 7-8 वर्ष giving 70000-80000 eggs everyday . 
सम्पूर्ण विश्व is aware of दीमक पतंग . 
यह is prevalent in entire world as compared to विश्वव्यापी पतंग . 
उत्पत्ति भी of इस पतंग is also very old . 
There is a story of दीमक catching a sage 's शरीर in पुस्तक . 
Thus on अत : इस आधार the age of ये पतंग and the harmful effects that they could have done can होने यह अनुमान . 
विभिन्न उपाय to curb them are being considered everywhere in विश्व . 
आक्रमण is seen more on the objects made from wood , chevron , bamboo etc. . 
There are चार प्रकार of दीमक in a single burrow . 
जो दीमक that नष्ट the things are कहा जाता है जो दीमक . 
Every labor termite is दीमक चौथाई इंच tall and light yellow-golden in हल्के पीले -झौईण् सुनहले रंग . 
Eating things and making burrows in भूमि , एकत्रित भूमि and building houses outside ground and carrying नये दीमक from एक स्थान to another is the job of नये दीमक . 
9-10 millions of दीमक stay in every burrow and there is एक ऐसा स्थान which is called राज्य गृह . 
राजा and दीमक stay in इसी राज्य -झौईण् गृह . 
रानी दीमक keeps the new eggs in एक उपवन near मज़दूर दीमक राज्य -झौईण् गृह . 
यह उपवन is स्थान for eggs . 
It has fungal growth and which is eaten by नये दीमक coming out of the eggs . 
राज्य -झौईण् गृह and उपवन भी also has some कुछ रक्षक दीमक whose कार्य is to केवल रक्षा . 
Only seven केवल सात प्रकार of tiddi insects in विश्व have been known so far . 
Amongst them अकेले भारतवर्ष alone has तीन प्रकार of tiddis . 
These tiddis are not only found in भारत ही but also in middle east and केन्द्रीय अफ्रीका भी . 
The most devastating of these three of tiddis is the one which is कहा जाता है desert tiddi . 
In English इस पतंग is called Shistosarka-grigeria . 
In भारतवर्ष अन्दर these tiddis are found in the desert of सिंध and राजस्थान . 
Outside भारत बाहर they develop and grow in Balochistan etc. also . 
The eggs of tiddis are very small yellow and brown in कुछ भूरे रंग , like चावल . 
During गर्मी these eggs फूट जाते हैं within 12-14 दिन ही . 
But during winters they take at least 25-26 दिनों in hatching . 
सरकार has made many arrangements considering आक्रमण as national difficulty . 
एक संस्था has been खोली गई है under रेख of अधिकारी whose officers keep पूरी जानकारी about आक्रमण . 
Thus सूचना regarding the tiddis attack should be provided to निकटवर्ती सरकारी अधिकारी . 
कार्यवाही should be quickly taken after सूचना . 
ये अधिकारी will follow उन्हीं उपायों which मैंने have told आपको पहले before . 
But this does not यह अर्थ that all the works will be done by सभी कार्य सरकारी अधिकारी ही . 
आपको should सहायता them while प्रयोग every possible remedy . 
We believe that आक्रमण is एक सरकारी मामला but सभी लोगों of गांव should give physical , psychological and monetary सहायता . 
Arrange for 10 सेर पानी , 25 ser paddy straw , सोडियम फ्लाउसिलिकेट and 3 ser jaggery . 
Now mix थोड़ा सा जल into it and make घोल दीजिए . 
Knead the entire hay with रस ही . 
Mix ' sodium flausilicate ' in this kneaded thing . 
मिश्रण thus तैयार should हो neither too dry nor tough or loose . 
Then इस मिश्रण should be डाल दीजिए very early morning into खेत . 
इस प्रयोग kills majority of अधिकांश पतंग . 
12-14 सेर मिश्रण is adequate for bigha land .

सरकार has प्रोत्साहित संगठित विपणन of agricultural products in देश through नेटवर्क of regulated markets . 
Most of the state governments and Union Territories have made कानून for विकास कृषि उत्पाद मंडियों . 
7,177 markets have been covered under विनियम till March , 2002 . 
Out of which around 15 % कार्य under क्षेत्र . 
Yet अध्ययन says that the establishment of regulated markets have achieved सीमित सफलता in प्रदान need based आवश्यकता -झौईण् आधारित सुविधाओं and services in निर्माण an able सक्षम विपणन . 
There is कमी of अपेक्षित सुविधाओं to संभालने most of उत्पाद in regulated markets . 
Rural periodic markets generally and tribal markets particularly have रही हैं out of विकास क्षेत्र बाहर . 
एकाधिकारी पद्धतियों and traditions have stopped संचालन of कृषि विपणन through free and competitive व्यापार , , प्रयोग of modern techniques in सट्टा बाजार फसलोत्तर प्रौद्योगिकी and निर्यात , , agricultural based कृषि आधारित उद्योगों and goods granaries etc. . 
प्रतिस्पर्धा प्रतिस्पर्धा and प्रदान अन्य सुविधाएं such as categorization , standardization , storage , financial security , etc have हो गया है subsidiary works . 
Efficient agricultural marketing facility is जरूरत for विकास of कृषि क्षेत्र . 
It is essential to have flexible , quick and inclusive marketing structure to सामना challenges like बढ़ते उत्पादन , , प्रसार of new technologies , changing आर्थिक परिवेश , , आकार of वितरण श्रृंखला and बढ़ते मांग , to कम मार्जिन between अंतिम उपभोक्ता बीच and किसानों , consequences emerged due to उदारीकरण and globalization after निर्धारित अवधि बाद of विश्व व्यापार संगठन . 
उदारीकरण of कृषि in विश्व व्यापार have provided नए अवसर to फार्म सेक्टर to send their agricultural products in विश्वव्यापी बाजार . 
In order to provide पहुंच to agricultural communities , यह is essential that आंतरिक कृषि विपणन व्यवस्था in देश is एकीकृत and मजबूत . 
Currently only state governments under state agricultural marketing regulation act have been दिया गया है अधिकार to start प्रक्रिया of स्थापित regulated agricultural markets . 
As a result of प्रक्रिया of स्थापित markets , निजी क्षेत्र can not initiate the establishment markets with सर्वोत्तम सुविधाओं . 
भूमिका of सरकार in इस क्षेत्र should होनी चाहिए न of एक सहायक and not of a market manager or नियंत्रक . 
Essential high level labor skill and more and more capital for आधारिक संरचना and प्रबंधन of मंडी can only होते हैं प्राप्त from private sectors .

Thus they बच जाते हैं ढुलाई खर्च on transportation to bring उत्पाद from खेत to विनियमित मंडी for बिक्री .

In विकसित दुनिया it is extended from कार्बनिक कृषि ) -LRB- for जैविक कृषि ( उदाहरण , पर्माकल्चर or कार्बनिक कृषि ) -RRB- till कार्बनिक कृषि ) -LRB- जैविक कृषि ( उदाहरण कार्बनिक कृषि ) -RRB- . 
The importance of कृषि in the socio-economic framework of भारत can be महसूस by इस तथ्य that आजीविका of most of देश अधिकांश जनसंख्या is dependent on कृषि . 
योगदान of कृषि क्षेत्र to the Gross Domestic Product -LRB- G D P -RRB- is केवल 18 प्रतिशत while as more than 60 जनसंख्या is dependent on इस , फलस्वरूप of which the per capita प्रति व्यक्‍ति आय in less . 
इससे is also understood from this that there is a lot of बड़ी असमानता between the per capita आय बीच in कृषि क्षेत्र and कृषि क्षेत्र . 
So it is necessary to समाधान those issues which have प्रभाव on स्तरों of किसानों . 
स्तर of आय is निर्धारित by कुल उत्पादन and स्तर and प्राप्‍त मूल्यों obtained by किसानों . 
Obstacles like abundance of small and tertiary cultivation which is about 80 लगभग 82 प्रतिशत of the total cultivation , incomplete market conditions and shortage of post and pre-communication also adversely affect आय स्तरों of किसानों . 
Accordingly , हो , is necessary to frame a useful strategy for making कृषि कार्यकलाप more workable and स्थायी सुधार in आर्थिक स्थिति of किसानों is assured . 
Other than this , many big and small irrigation projects were also undertaken . 
In आरंभ of दशक of 1960 एक एकीकृत कार्यक्रम was आरंभ for increasing उत्पादकता and benefiting किसानों and for कृषि विकास . 
किसानों were acquainted with it and they too adopted नए बीजों and technologies . 
As फलस्वरूप , , in the late sixties there was a lot of काफी प्रगति in उत्पादकता and उत्पादकता of गेहूं . 
Other than this , नई रणनीति बल on सघनता of अधिक फसल . 
From then , वृद्धि दर of जनसंख्या वृद्धि in the agricultural yield रही above वृद्धि दर of जनसंख्या वृद्धि in the population . 
As a result , a state of self sufficiency remained in foodgrains and this was known in the form of ' Green Revolution Age ' . 
Technology services , तालमेल in सरकारी नीति बीच and industriousness of किसानों were उद्यमशीलता of this age . 
Even then , during पिछले दशक दौरान उत्पादन and उत्पादन remained constant and दर भी of विकास slowed . 
To रोकने इस गिरावट and to move कृषि क्षेत्र ahead again , it is necessary to do अधिक प्रयास . 
During the year 2000 राष्‍ट्रीय कृषि नीति was अनुमोदित by भारत सरकार whose goal was to लक्ष्य 4 प्रतिशत more annual increase in कृषि on एक दीर्घावधिक आधार through the medium of प्रभावी उपयोग of प्राकृतिक संसाधनों and other means . 
On दूसरी ओर गैर -झौईण् कृषि क्षेत्र अपेक्षाकृत more fast as expected . 
The fall in प्रगति of गैर -झौईण् कृषि क्षेत्र and the decreasing profitability in कृषि in front of तीव्र वृद्धि समक्ष of गैर -झौईण् कृषि क्षेत्र is बात of worry . 
यह ठहराव was connected to उत्पादकता साथ of फसल , as फलस्वरूप स्तर of आय of किसानों रहा less . 
Normally in ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों and specially in farmer families , shortage of अवसरों is also समस्या .

For non-agricultural projects , as feasible , कोई भूमि with less fertility for संभव कृषि will be allotted . 
For सिंचाई , अनुपलब्धता of जल and at सही समय is becoming एक गंभीर समस्या currently in अनेक भागों of देश in achieving उच्चतर उत्पादकता and स्थिरता in खेती .

यात्रा of the Hindi Cinema dates long back up to the point where हुई थी has पहुंचने आज . 
The movie '' Bandit Queen '' featured in 1994 had set नई राह & दिशा for हिंदी सिनेमा . 
यह फ़िल्म निर्देशित by शेखर कपूर थी आधारित on किताब India 's Bandit Queen : The true story of दि ट्रू स्टोरी ऑफ फूलन देवी '' by माला सेन . 
पूरी फ़िल्म was filmed in चंबल घाटी and the surrounding areas of उत्तर प्रदेश and उत्तर प्रदेश . 
The music direction of इस फ़िल्म was done by प्रसिद्ध गायक of उस्ताद नुसरत फतेह अली खान . 
There are no male or female actors गाता on stage in इस फ़िल्म . 
संवाद of इस फ़िल्म were full of abuses . 
Bandit Queen ' थे successful at खिड़की ( बॉक्स ऑफिस ) and it won so many कई सारे पुरस्कार . 
फ़िल्म प्रदर्शित रामगोपाल featured in 1988 by Ram gopal verma साबित to हुई a milestone in इतिहास of सिनेमा . 
वर्मा had established himself because of his films - ' Shiva ' and ' Rangila ' and now उन्हें wanted to do something new . 
उन्होंने thought of making movies on अपराध -झौईण् जगत of मुंबई . 
इस फ़िल्म with a budget of दो करोड़ did कारोबार of दो करोड़ . 
शूटिंग of पूरी फ़िल्म was done on the lanes and streets of मुंबई . 
संपादन of इस फ़िल्म was not done through the then prevalent प्रचलित स्टेनबैक मशीन but in the form of संपादन . 
The playback music in इस फ़िल्म by Sandeep Chauta startled लोगों . 
All the actors of फ़िल्मों except मातोंडकर and चक्रवर्ती were कास्ट from theater . 
किरदार and संवाद in इस फ़िल्म were not filmy but of आम बोलचाल . 
आज popular अनुराग कश्यप थे one of the writers of इस फ़िल्म . 
In the year 2001 सिनेमा again ली a new turn . 
The two films इस सांल this year , Lagan ' और Dil chahta hai ' बदल दिए both व्याकरण and समीकरण of Indian Cinema . 
Since then , आज भी संवाद of some films are डब in स्टूडियो . 
पहली फ़िल्म of director Rajkumar Hirani ' Munna Bhai MBBs ' आई in 2003 . 
चुटीले मुंबइया संवाद and the hidden messages of इस फ़िल्म made लोगों laugh a lot and compelled them to watch इस फ़िल्म again and again . 
The movie ' Khosla ka Ghosla ' built under निर्देशन of दीवाकर बनर्जी was प्रदर्शित in 2006 . 
इस फ़िल्म made with कम बजट falsified इस भ्रांति that the audience likes to watch only star cast movies . 
कहानी of फ़िल्म was new and इसे was made in an entertaining way with a put of comic-satire . 
लोग of मुंबई फ़िल्म उद्योग call such films as ' ड्राविन सिनेमा ' . 
सबसे ज्यादा ध्यान in these movies is laid on नए विषयवस्तु and theme .

With this a lot more things बदलने लगीं in the Indian Cinema . 
Now नायक are rarely seen themselves singing गीत on the stage . 
Now a days the supremacy of play back singing has increased more than the songs . 
Now the Hindi movies are shot less in the artificial sets and more outside मुंबई . 
The majority of ज्यादातर शूटिंग of the films such as Gangajal , Omkara , Swadesh and Dabang was done in गांव वाई नाम Wai situated at some distance to मुंबई near Mahabalehwar . 
आज movies are filmed in वास्तविक शहरों and villages . 
The costumes of the Indian movies have also नहीं रहे like the old ones . 
The popular costumes designers of देश now design costumes for the Bollywood movies . 
The costume designers for their movies खरीदते the costumes from abroad when they तो नहीं मिले the costumes of their choice in देश . 
असर of all these things are clearly visible in the increased expenditure on Indian Cinema .

आज movies कमाती हैं पैसे using new ways .

उद्देश्य ही of शिक्षा is to live सार्थक जीवन . 
Actually Cinema illustrates the reality of सिनेमा समाज , shows the burning issues of सिनेमा समाज on silver screen and raises सवाल .

But due to being यथार्थवादी कवि , प्रकृति is not much present directly in कविता . 
In प्राकृतिक चित्रण प्रकृतिक चित्रण Bhartendu Jee did not नहीं मिली , अधिक सफलता , because वे थे , the artificer of the human-nature , in मानव -झौईण् प्रकृति his mind did not indulge completely . 
Hence , in the most of his natural illustrations there is अभाव of शक्ति to आकर्षित the human heart .

In साहित्य Bhartendu Jee has very important अत्यंत महत्त्वपूर्ण स्थान . 
भारतेन्दु थे स्वामी of the versatility .

Bhartendu Jee emerged with संदेश of नवजागरण in the Hindi literature .

By assimilating the novelty and originality in भाषा and शैली उन्हें made them according to आधुनिक काल . . 
वे is considered as the father of आधुनिक हिंदी .

From his perspective , at उस समय हिन्दी was भाषा थी of the country 's uplifting . 
राष्ट्र of the national integrity was हिन्दी थी . 
From नाम of भारतेन्दु एक पूरा युग of पत्रकारिता is recognised . 
In इस युग , getting प्रेरणा and प्रोत्साहन from his energetic compositions , श्रृंखला of many blessed self addressee journalists-litterateur was तैयार .

युग facing with his this इस प्रतिभा रूबरू was called युग of संपूर्ण युग पत्रकारिता . 
In इस युग , नए प्रयोग , , नए लेखन and नई शैली मिला proper encouragement .

It would हो बात of the affection toward मातृभाषा or would हो स्नेह of the imported cloths . 
Before कई वर्ष from नेताओं पूर्व भारतेन्दु had blown the bugle . 
In his edited magazines in their motivation भारतेन्दु made उद्देश्य the progression of समाज , देखिए उदाहरण of his इस प्रगतिशील सोच that during उन दिनों for महिलाओं उनकी published the ' Stri Baal Bodhini ' संपादित पत्रिकाओं and महिलाओं who were studying English used to be gifted the sari from the side of संपादित पत्रिकाओं .

In निबंध and dramas राष्ट्रप्रेम of भारतेन्दु seems छ्लकता out .

भारतेन्दु was cheated by his own but like an innocent child उन्होंने never loosens to विश्वास . 
If उन्हें would नहीं होगी कहा जाए अग्रदूत of हिन्दी नवजागरण then नहीं होगी will not नहीं होगी exaggerated . 
युगप्रवर्तक of the modern Hindi Bhartendu Babu Harishchandra , on the June month of the 1877 आयोजित by the Hindivardhani Society of the Kashi read लिखित व्याख्यान on विषय of the development of आधुनिक हिन्दी that was completely poetic . 
भाषा frames the human cultures and influences समझ . 
It is कहना of the Linguist that after learning एक भाषा होता है is good to सीखने बाद एक भाषा . 
But misfortune of देश भाषाओं is this that despite of getting दर्जा of अलग राज्य देश is still अछूता from the most fundamental इस अत्यावश्यक मूलभूत भाषाई अवधारणा of शिक्षा for विकास . 
युग of भारतेन्दु था the period of the fall of सांस्कृतिक परंपरा in this , language dialects were also being बदल रही थी from पाश्चात्यीकरण of शिक्षा समाज . 
In ऐसी ही स्थिति itself उन्होंने presented these thoughts regarding मातृभाषा . 
To establish भारतीय भाषाओं in जगह of अंग्रेजी was पक्ष था of the concern of भारतेन्दु . 
इसके talked about पराधीनता which is being established gradually at its core even in thought . 
भारतेन्दु प्रयोग the ' Nijbhasha ' -LRB- our language -RRB- ' निजभाषा ' शब्द in the broad perspective . 
Here आशय is not just भाषा . 
उनका has मतलब of it from the all the languages of देश . 
And in this with क्षेत्रीय भाषा साथ , क्षेत्रीय भाषा साथ संस्कृत भी should be also शामिल . 
This is also प्राचीन भाषा of भारत , in the legacy the glimpse of the Indian ancient life shadow is established . 
Sharatchandra Chatopadhyaya , in लिखे उपन्यासों has प्रस्तुत the story of समाज in the way in that from एक बौद्धिक चेतना an attempt is included to know the anomalies , चेष्टा of जानने of तत्कालीन बंगाल . 
इस सुप्रसिद्ध उपन्यासकार of the Bangala took जन्म on 15 सितम्बर , , year 1876 at स्थान नामक Devanandpur . 
उन्होंने cleared एट्रेंस at the age of अठारह साल . 
During इन्हीं दिनों उन्होंने wrote एक उपन्यास with नाम of Basa -LRB- ( घर ) -RRB- , but रचना was not प्रकाशित . 
गहरा प्रभाव of रवींद्रनाथ ठाकुर and बंकिमचंद्र चटोपाध्याय was over him . 
Sharatchandra थे the student of छात्र but due to आर्थिक तंगी वह could not study इस विषय . 
After coming back from बर्मा उन्होंने शुरू to लिखना his famous novel Shrikant . 
In बर्मा उनका came in संपर्क with एक व्यक्ति नामक बंगचंद्र though उनका था very intelligent but था alcoholic and undisciplined . 
From here itself बीज of the Charitraheen was sown , in that with वर्णन साथ of मेस जीवन there is कहानी of प्रेम with मेस of the mess . 
When once वह आए तो from बर्मा to कलकत्ता then छोड़ गए his some composition with one of his friends in कलकत्ता . 
Without telling Sharat serial publication of एक रचना बड़ी दीदी from those has been शुरू . 
Just after releasing of one two issue सनसनी फैल गई among लोगों and they started to कहने लगे that रवींद्रनाथ is writing by changing नाम . 
शरत got खबर after five and साढ़े पाँच साल बाद . 
Whatever was there he became famous , even though many problems have occurred in the publication of Charitraheen . 
संपादक of the Bharatvarsh poet Dwijendralal refused to publish इसे by कहकर इसे that इसे is against the morality . 
SharatChandra Chatopadhyaya has got वैसा ही श्रेष्ठ स्थान in साहित्य as रवीन्द्रनाथ टैगोर has got into the poetry of इस भाषा . 
On the Bengal revolutionary movement दावी उपन्यास was written . 
In इस उपन्यास there is वर्णन of the life story of the Subhash Chandra Bose . 
इसे had been जब्त by ब्रिटिश सरकार . 
शरत of शरत have been अनुवाद in the many Indian languages . 
उनके is कहा जाता है that his heroines are more powerful than his male characters . 
His creation touches the heart deeply . 
But in the Sharat literature , despite of having सारे तत्व , in कम प्रकाश पड़ता है falls over the social conflicts , शोषण आदि etc. . 
In the Palli Samaj , some picture of पल्ली समाज comes in कुछ कुछ सामने . 
In some stories like महेश आदि etc question of शोषण appears . 
On the basis of कुछ उपन्यासों Hindi pictures has been made कई बार .

प्रसिद्ध लेखक of विष्णु प्रभाकर has written जीवनी of शरतचन्द्र which is famous by नाम of the Awaara Masiha . 
यायावर is viewed as लेखक in हिन्दी and उन्हें is also कहा जाता है wanderer . 
इन्होंने has रचना विपुल साहित्य in that there is समावेश of उपन्यास and books of इतिहास , , समाज . 
राहुल सांकृत्यायन who is दी जाती है the honour of महापंडित were a prominent author of हिन्दी . 
वे थे एक प्रतिष्ठित बहुभाषाविद and in the early in बीसवीं सदी वे gave योगदान in क्षेत्र of वृतांत साहित्य and विश्व -झौईण् दर्शन लेखन . 
वह is called पितामह of the Hindi travelogue literature . 
His research on the Buddhism is considered युगान्तरकारी in शोध हिन्दी साहित्य , for that उनको had तिब्बत from श्रीलंका to श्रीलंका . 
Despite that , उन्होंने wrote यात्रा on travelling in the Middle-Asia and Tibet , which are very important in the literature perspective . 
शास्त्र is चर्चित पुस्तक . 
He asserted whole life with the creativity , quest , thinking and change . 
राजनीति नहीं था his work field but रुचि of राहुल नहीं था enamored towards आकृष्ट also . 
दुनियाँ of राहुल थी among the world 's great thinkers and intellectuals . 
मूलमंत्र ही of जीवन of राहुल सांकृत्यायन has been remaining wandering or mobility . 
Wandering for him था a practice but वरन धर्म . 
In आधुनिक हिन्दी साहित्य , राहुल सांकृत्यायन is known as लेखक , , लेखक , . 
इन्हें is considered as a prominent author of हिन्दी . 
राहुल सांकृत्यायन थे a Brahmin . 
इनका took जन्म on 9th April 1893 at Pandahaa पंदहा गाँव in आजमगढ़ जिले of उत्तर प्रदेश . 
नाम was Kedarnath Pande . 
Due to death of mother in बचपन ही his upbringing had been done by पाठक and grand mother . 
In 1898 for प्राथमिक शिक्षा he was भेजा गया to a seminary of गाँव ही itself . 
Rahul Jee was married in बचपन . 
यह विवाह was a transitional event in जीवन of राहुल जी . 
In प्रतिक्रिया of that Rahul Jee छोड़ दिया घर in किशोरावस्था ही itself . 
Running away from घर he became saint in a monastry . 
But due to his wanderer nature even he could not stay there . 
In the age of चौदह वर्ष he ये कलकत्ता to ये कलकत्ता . 
In मन गहरा असंतोष था there to earn ज्ञान . 
That 's why , from here to there he kept wandering सारे भारत . 
Excursion of the country-abroad and writing was प्रिय कार्य of लेखन राहुल . 
साहित्य of राहुल सांकृत्यायन is broad . 
राहुल सांकृत्यायन थे the product of उस दौर when under ब्रिटिश शासन अन्तर्गत भारतीय समाज , , संस्कृति , , अर्थव्यवस्था , and राजनीति were all going through उस दौर . 
That था दौर of the social reformers and काँग्रेस था in infancy then . 
In the year 1930 , after जाकर श्रीलंका वे became initiated from Buddhism and since then itself वे became ' ' राहुल ' ' from ' Ramodar Sadhu ' and due the Sankritya sept was called सांकृत्यायन . 
Looking at अद्भूत तर्कशक्ति and unique knowledge , pandits of the Kashi gave him the honor of महापंडित and thus उनकी became राहुल सांकृत्यायन from Kedarnath Pandey . 
Pandit of ज्ञाता राहुल composed the literature in the genres like संस्मरण and जीवनी आदि but most of the literature composed in अधिकांश साहित्य हिन्दी ही itself . 
Rahul was of the fact-finding and curious nature that 's why did गहन अध्ययन of the books of हर धर्म . 
He studied Sanskrit books during यात्रा दौरान of दक्षिण भारत , Pali-books during the stay in Tibet , Muslim religious book during the traveling of Lahore learning अरबी भाषा . 
To समझने राहुल as a litterateur it is must to read राजनीतिक साहित्य . 
Even after आकर्षण बाद भी towards the communist ideology राहुल did not नहीं रहे single-minded . 
1916 till 1916 , his Inclination became towards Buddhism . 
Getting teachings from the Buddhism , वे बने राहुल सांकृत्यायन . 
Due to fondness in the Buddhism he inclined to सीखने ओर Pali , Prakrit , Apbhransh etc. languages . 
रुसी क्रांति of the 1917 प्रभावित मन of जी . 
वे was Secretary-General of the All Indian Farmers Society . 
उन्होंने तिब्बत to तिब्बत चार बार and brought विपुल साहित्य from there . 
In 1932 Rahul Jee went for यात्रा of जी यूरोप . 
In 1935 , travelled to जापान , , Korea , Manchuriya . 
In 1937 , in Masco during traveling he fell in प्रेम with सचिव of the India-Tibet Department Lolo Yelena . 
And getting married there itself वे started to stay in रूस ही . 
Rahul Jee था बड़ा प्रेम to Himalaya . 
वे started to live in नैनीताल in 1950 , making home there . 
Here उनका got married to कमला सांकृत्यायन . 
After कुछ वर्षों बाद of this इसके started to live in Darjeeling -LRB- दार्जिलिंग ( पश्चिम बंगाल ) -RRB- , but later due to suffering from the diabetes वे was भेजा गया to रूस for इलाज . 
In 1963 , In रूस even after इलाज बाद भी of seven months स्वास्थ्य did not नहीं हुआ well . 
उनका died on 14th April 1963 in Darjeeling -LRB- दार्जिलिंग ( पश्चिम बंगाल ) -RRB- . 
Due to his death भारतीय साहित्य had irreparable loss . 
राहुल सांकृत्यायन थे an intellect . 
वे was living in गहरे असंतोष of ज्ञान , to पूरा गहरे असंतोष वे was always ready . 
उन्होंने gave हिन्दी साहित्य an enormous repertory . 
Talent of the Rahul Jee थे versatile and वे थे an extraordinary thinker . 
उन्होंने has done महत्त्वपूर्ण कार्य by edition religion , philosophy , folk literature , travelogue , history , politics , biography , dictionary and ancient books . 
In his compositions , समन्वय मिलता है to देखने of the belief towards antiquity , pride toward इतिहास and true vision towards वर्तमान . 
It थे , only यह केवल राहुल जी , who प्रयास to देने the integral perspective by आत्मसात the ancient and current Indian literature thoughts completely . 
उपन्यास and stories put completely new नए दृष्टिकोण in front of us . 
During यात्रा काल of तिब्बत and China journey उन्होंने reformed thousands of books and showed मार्ग for its edition and publication , these books are in the Patna Museum . 
महत्त्वपूर्ण लेखक in the travelogue has been जी रहे हैं . 
Kinnar Desh Ki Or , Kumanu , दार्जिलिंग परिचय and Yatra ke Panne are his such books . 
While reading this , we मिलती है जानकारी of these places of the country-abroad . 
राहुल सांकृत्यायन थे प्रतिपादक of दर्शन . 
उनका था his assumption that travelling being साधन to free मानव -झौईण् मन is also साधन of क्षितिज विस्तार भी of our own horizone . 
Imbibing his experiences of the traveling , राहुल also composed ' शास्त्र ' भी ' . 
वे थे a wanderer who थे in quest of सच्चे ज्ञान and whenever हो गया थे कोशिश to suppress सच वे turned rebellious . 
His whole life was filled with the internal contradictions . 
After reading the Vedant when उन्होंने gave व्याख्यान against परम्परा of the sacrifice in the temple then सनातनी पुरोहित over him with sticks . 
Despite of accepting Buddhism वह could not accept its ideology of rebirth . 
In the year 1974 as director of अखिल भारतीय साहित्य सम्मेलन उन्होंने मना to speak the early printed speech and the speech उन्होंने delivered , that था against नीतियों of the Communist Party over the अल्पसंख्य संस्कृति and the language issue . 
Hence , उन्हें has to होना पड़ा , वंचित from सदस्यता of नतीजन पार्टी , but even though his attitude did not change . 
During this time period apart from किसी बंदिश वे kept attached with the concerns of प्रगतिशील लेखन and contemporary issues . 
Meanwhile , उन्होंने emphesised to implement the Marxist ideology after measuring the concrete circumstances of भारतीय समाज . 
In पुस्तक Vaigyanik Bhautikvad ' एवं Darshan-Digdarshan ' he highlighted in इस सम्बन्ध . 
Eventually , during the year 1953-54 again , वे became सदस्य of कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी . 
During एक वर्ष , regarding the farmer-movement उन्हें was imprisoned for एक वर्ष then during this prison-stay of the Devali camp उन्हें रचना the book ' Darshan-Digdarshan ' . 
After आन्दोलन of 1942 coming out of prison , उन्हें was declared editor of the weekly magazine ' Hunkar ' which was प्रकाशित by शीर्ष नेता of स्वामी सहजानन्द सरस्वती . 
ब्रिटिश सरकार , while adopting नीति of Divide and Rule जारी an advertisement titled ' Fight with the thugs ' for four points in non Congress journals . 
राहुल थे स्वामी of सच्चे व्यक्तित्व and beside राजनीति in व्यक्तिगत जीवन with the fact of the affairs this harmony of सच्चे व्यक्तित्व always retained . 
राहुल abdicated his marriage and family गृहस्थ जीवन which was done at उम्र of ग्यारह वर्ष , some where inside him a revolution has emerged . 
जीवन of राहुल gives संदेश to लोगों of संसार to know संसार away from सीमा of the state of देश and motivates to लेने the ordination of the travelling oath . 
Rahul Sankrityaayan always remained wanderer . 
Since year 1923 his series of foreign visits शुरू , हुआ ended with जीवन साथ ही itself . 
In his these travelings encouraged by the motivation to collect the knowledge travelings of जापान and रूस are notable . 
वे Reached तिब्बत चार बार . 
He stayed there for लम्बे समय and reformed उस विरासत of भारत , which had हो चुकी थी unknown , rare and forgotten for us . 
राहुल came back from तिब्बत with pride and ample material from there , to that होना became mandatory to परिवर्तन in the many pre established values and conclusions related to इतिहास of हिन्दी भाषा and साहित्य . 
Simultaneously , नए क्षितिज of शोध and अध्ययन were open . 
Rahul went to तिब्बत गये as an author , tourist and historian . 
In respect of भारत his यह काम can not be assessed less than Hwensang . 
राहुल थे multilingual but उन्होंने wrote in मातृभाषा itself . 
वे थे हिमायती of राष्ट्रभाषा for a nation .

वे had never seen किसी प्रकार of राष्ट्रभाषा in विकास and विकास of राष्ट्रभाषा and regional languages . 
उनका था his supposition that विकास of हिन्दी as एक भाषा is possible on the foundation of these regional languages . 
वे used to assume हिन्दी as उदधृत from लोक संस्कृति and classical background of लोक संस्कृति . 
Rahul रहे प्रभावित for whole life from राहुल बौद्ध दर्शन and Mark , s communist ideas .
